SA11bsa054_u:3323: āryasarvāstivādinā paṭhyate- paśyatha bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam?
SA11bsa054_u:3330: athāyuṣmānupāliryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣorevaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
SA11bsa054_u:3331: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti?
SA11bsa054_u:3332: nāhamupāle evaṃ kṣatimupahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike duṣṭacittamutpādayati /
SA11bsa054_u:3333: tatropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3334: tasmāttarhi upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3337: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3339: na ca dveṣeṇa samaṃ pāpamaśubhaṃ puṇyābhibhavaheturasti /
SA11bsa054_u:3340: na ca kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3342: yata evam, tasmāt kṣāntiṃ kṣamāṃ sarvatātparyeṇa bhavayedabhyaset /
SA11bsa054_u:3345: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśrute /
SA11bsa054_u:3346: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // Bca_6.3 //
SA11bsa054_u:3350: saṃkṣepānnāsti tatkiṃcit krodhano yena susthitaḥ // Bca_6.5 //
SA11bsa054_u:3352: anupaśānta eva sadā dveṣānalaprajvalitatvāt na prītisukhaṃ saumanasyasukhamaśnute āpnoti,
SA11bsa054_u:3354: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ cittasukhaṃ labhate kāyacittasaṃtāpakāriṇi dveṣaśalye hṛdayanivāsini /
SA11bsa054_u:3359: suhṛdo bhitrāṇyapi udvijante uttrasanti asmād dveṣiṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3361: kiṃ bahunā? idamiha saṃkṣepeṇāvadhāryatām- nāsti tadupaśamakāraṇaṃ kiṃcidyena kopanaḥ sukhaṃ labheta //
SA11bsa054_u:3365: iti anayorbhede 'pi dvayorapi parihartavyatayā abhedenaiva nirdeśaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3366: evamiha dṛṣṭadharme 'pi dveṣadoṣānavagamya tatparityāgāya yatnavatā bhavitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3368: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca // Bca_6.6 //
SA11bsa054_u:3376: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām // Bca_6.7 //
SA11bsa054_u:3382: na tu paramārthataḥ kiṃcidiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3385: tasmāt tatkāriṇi tadvirodhini vā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3387: labdhasāmarthyaḥ san dveṣo nihanti mām iti niścitya tatpuṣṭikāraṇaṃ ca haniṣyāmi prathamataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3393: yasmāt mama vadhaṃ vihāya rātriṃdivamaparaṃ na kiṃcid dveṣasya vairiṇaḥ karaṇīyamasti //
SA11bsa054_u:3394: evaṃ dveṣadoṣān vibhāvya sarvopāyena tadvipakśabhūtāṃ kṣāntimutpādayet /
SA11bsa054_u:3412: tathāpi na kṣobhyā na vikopayitavyā muditā mayā /
SA11bsa054_u:3416: kutaḥ? daurmanasye 'pi kṛte iṣṭavighāte sati nāstīṣṭaṃ nābhilaṣitaṃ setsyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3417: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ syāt- kuśalaṃ punarupahanyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3418: muditā ca āryākśayamatisūtre varṇitā- tatra katamā muditā?
SA11bsa054_u:3419: yā buddhadharmāṇāmanusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyānavalīnatā anavamṛdyatā aparitarṣaṇatā,
SA11bsa054_u:3429: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim // Bca_6.10 //
SA11bsa054_u:3430: yadi ca iṣṭavighātanivartanāya aniṣṭopanipātapratiṣedhāya ca pratīkāraḥ upāyāntaramasti,
SA11bsa054_u:3433: atha nāsti, tadāpi daurmanasyena tatra kim?
SA11bsa054_u:3455: duḥkhenaiva ca niḥsāraḥ cetastasmād dṛḍhībhava // Bca_6.12 //
SA11bsa054_u:3456: mahatā prāyatnena kuśalapakṣamupasevya kadācit karhicit sudurlabhaṃ saṃsāre sāsravaṃ sukhaṃ labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3467: api ca / idaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthasādhakatvāt soḍhumucitam,
SA11bsa054_u:3470: vṛthā sahante muktyarthamahaṃ kasmāttu kātaraḥ // Bca_6.13 //
SA11bsa054_u:3472: mahānavamīsamayādiṣu trirātramekāhaṃ vā upoṣya gātradāhacchedanabhedanaṃ kurvanto duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ niṣphalamevānubhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3473: tathā karṇāṭadeśādisamudbhūtā dākṣiṇātyā uparināmalikhanamātrābhimānataḥ parasparaṃ spardhamānā anekābhiḥ kāraṇābhirduḥkhamanubhavanto jīvitamapyutsṛjanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3474: ahaṃ tu svaparātmanoḥ paramadurlabhabuddhatvasādhanāya kṛtotsāhaḥ duḥkhaiḥ kasmāt kāraṇāt kātarībhavāmi?
SA11bsa054_u:3476: karacaraṇaśiraśchedanādiduḥkhaṃ narakādiduḥkhaṃ vā muktayarthaṃ kathaṃ nu soḍhavyamityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3479: śāstrābhyāsakalādi kauśalādi mṛdumadhyātimātraduḥkhānubhavanādi vā vastu na tadvidyate kiṃcit yadabhyāsagocaro na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3486: evaṃ niṣpandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11bsa054_u:3489: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisattvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhāmeva vedanāṃ vedayate na duḥkhām,
SA11bsa054_u:3491: tasya nairayikāmapi vedanāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3495: vetrairapi tāḍyamānasya ardhavetrairapi kaśābhirapi tāḍayamānasya sukhasaṃjñā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:3500: tailapradyotikaṃ vā ādīpyamānasya yāvat kārṣāpaṇacchedikāṃ chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikāṃ vā pācyamānasya,
SA11bsa054_u:3503: syādevaitad yadi prathamata eva mṛduvyathābhyasaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3506: mahatkaṇḍvādiduḥkhaṃ ca kimanarthaṃ na paśyasi // Bca_6.15 //
SA11bsa054_u:3511: saukumāryaṃ na kartavyamanyathā vardhate vyathā // Bca_6.16 //
SA11bsa054_u:3516: paraśoṇitamapyeke dṛṣṭvā mūrcchāṃ vrajanti yat // Bca_6.17 //
SA11bsa054_u:3520: tathāhi- kecidvīrapuruṣāḥ saṃgrāmabhūmau svaśoṇitamapi paśyanto 'dhikataraṃ śauryamābhajante /
SA11bsa054_u:3523: etadubhayamapi cittasya itaretarābhyāsaviparyayāt iti matvā duḥkhaduryodhano nādhigamyo bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:3528: duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3529: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā // Bca_6.19 //
SA11bsa054_u:3532: saṃgrāme ca vyathā nāma na bhavediti durlabham,
SA11bsa054_u:3534: nanu tathāpi duṣkaramidamatīva dṛśyata iti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3536: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ // Bca_6.20 //
SA11bsa054_u:3538: tatprahārān vakṣaḥsthalena pratīcchanto ye jayanti samare ripūn,
SA11bsa054_u:3539: te te śūrapuruṣāḥ pararipuvijayādiha labdhavijayāḥ praśasyante /
SA11bsa054_u:3541: te ca akiṃcitkaratayā mṛtamārakā jugupsanīyā eva śūraiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3544: saṃsāriṣu ca kāruṇyaṃ pāpadbhītirjine spṛhā // Bca_6.21 //
SA11bsa054_u:3549: pāpasya phalamidamiti matvā pāpād bhayamakaraṇacittaṃ ca,
SA11bsa054_u:3550: buddhe ca bhagavati spṛhā bhaktiḥ śraddhā cittaprasādaśca /
SA11bsa054_u:3554: sacetaneṣu kiṃ kopaḥ te 'pi pratyayakopitāḥ // Bca_6.22 //
SA11bsa054_u:3556: te ca tathāvidhāhāravihāravaiguṇyād viṣamāvasthāṃ prāptā vyādhīn janayantaḥ sarvaduḥkhahetavo bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3564: iti pittādivat teṣvapi na yujyate mama krodhaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3571: atha syāt- uktamatra sacetanāḥ saṃcintya tathāvidhāniṣṭakāriṇaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3573: kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3574: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca // Bca_6.24 //
SA11bsa054_u:3575: tatpratyayasāmagrīmantareṇa kupyāmītyevaṃ buddhipūrvakaṃ saṃcintya na janaḥ svairaṃ prakupyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3579: sarva tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate // Bca_6.25 //
SA11bsa054_u:3583: na cāpi janitasyāsti janito 'smīti cetanā // Bca_6.26 //
SA11bsa054_u:3584: pratyayasāmagryapi na svakāryaṃ janayantī saṃcintya janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:3585: sā hi svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmatayā tathāvidhaṃ kāryaṃ janayati na tu saṃcintya /
SA11bsa054_u:3586: na cāpi janitasya kāryasyāpi anayā sāmagryā janito 'smīti cetanā manasikāro 'sti /
SA11bsa054_u:3593: syādetat- astyeva svatantraṃ yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pradhānamātmā ca,
SA11bsa054_u:3598: tadeva hi bhavābhīti na saṃcintyopajāyate // Bca_6.27 //
SA11bsa054_u:3602: āha- yasmāttadeva svayameva tadaparakāraṇābhāvād bhavāmi samutpadya iti nābhisaṃdhāya jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3604: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3621: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3628: tadutpāde ca tasyāpyutpāda iti kathaṃ nātmana utpāda iṣyata iti /
SA11bsa054_u:3630: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3661: atha aparasahakāripratyayasaṃnidhau niṣkriyasyāpi tasya kriyā[bhyu]pagamyate / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:3667: yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:3671: yena pratyayāntarasaṅge tasya kriyā vyavasthāpyeta? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:3672: ubhayasaṃbandhābhāvāt tasya ātmanaḥ kriyeyamiti saṃbandhe katarattadanyanimittam?
SA11bsa054_u:3677: evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3679: evamuktanayena paravaśaṃ parāyattaṃ sarvaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaṃ vastujātam /
SA11bsa054_u:3680: tarhi yadvaśe tadaparāyattaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:3682: evaṃ sa heturapi svahetorityanādisaṃsāraparaṃparāyāṃ na svavaśitā kvacidapi saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3684: kaḥ kasmai druhyati paramārthataḥ yenāparādhini kvacit kasyacidaparādhe tasya dveṣo yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3686: aceṣṭeṣu nirīheṣu sarvadharmeṣu evaṃ satsu kva kupyatām?
SA11bsa054_u:3687: na yujyate prekṣāvatāṃ kvacidapi kopa iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3688: syādetat- evaṃ hi ekaṃ samarthayato dvitīyaṃ vighaṭate ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3689: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3690: samarthitanyāyenaiva vāraṇāpi nivartanamapi nirmāṇavadaceṣṭeṣu bhāveṣu na yuktā /
SA11bsa054_u:3691: evamiti yadā kiṃcidapi svatantraṃ na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3697: svatantraḥ kartā kiṃ niṣedhyaṃ svatantrapravṛttaṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3698: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- na hi samāne 'pi nyāye kvacit pravṛttiḥ sāmānyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3705: idaṃ pratītyedamutpadyate iti pratītyasamutpannatā yasmādasti nirvyāpāreṣvapi bhāveṣu,
SA11bsa054_u:3709: tathāpi pratītyasamutpādavaśāt pāratantryamupadarśitam- evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvam [6. 31] ityādivacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3718: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet // Bca_6.33 //
SA11bsa054_u:3721: kutaḥ? īdṛśā apakārakaraṇaśīlahetavaḥ asya amitrasya itarasya vā,
SA11bsa054_u:3724: kiṃ ca / duḥkhopanipātena cittakṣobhe 'pi na duḥkhasya nivṛttirastītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3725: yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
SA11bsa054_u:3726: na bhavetkasyacidduḥkhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kaścidicchati // Bca_6.34 //
SA11bsa054_u:3729: tathātve sa ti na bhavet kasyacit sattvasya duḥkham /
SA11bsa054_u:3738: tadaiṣāṃ parakāyeṣu parihāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet // Bca_6.37 //
SA11bsa054_u:3752: yadaivamuktakrameṇa kleśavaśyatvāt kleśaparatantratvāt ete sattvā ātmānamapi priyaṃ vallabhaṃ ghnanti pīḍayanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3753: tadā eṣāṃ parakāyeṣu paraśarīreṣu apakāraviratiḥ kathaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:3757: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham // Bca_6.38 //
SA11bsa054_u:3758: piśācairiva grasteṣu eṣu apakārakāriṣu uktanayena pravṛtteṣu ātmaghātane parāpakāradvāreṇa vā na kevalaṃ na tāvat kṛpā nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:3760: dveṣa utpadyate kathaṃ kṛpāsthāneṣviti viparyayo mahān //
SA11bsa054_u:3763: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake // Bca_6.39 //
SA11bsa054_u:3765: bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yadi etādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ paropadravakāritā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:3766: tadā na khalu svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogamarhanti- kimiti parāpakāraṃ kurvanti te?
SA11bsa054_u:3767: iti paribhāvya teṣu dveṣo na yukto me /
SA11bsa054_u:3773: atha doṣo 'yamāgantuḥ anya eva na tatsvabhāvabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3780: na hi kaṭutā nāma nirmalasyākāśasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3782: ataśca taddoṣeṇa dhūma eva doṣo yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3785: (Bcp 92) api ca / yadeva hi pradhānaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:3786: tatra yukto bhavet kopo nāpradhāne ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3787: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3788: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // Bca_6.41 //
SA11bsa054_u:3790: tato daṇḍa eva mukhyaṃ duḥkhakāraṇamiti tatraiva kopo yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3793: evaṃ tarhi dveṣeṇa so 'pi daṇḍaprerakaḥ prerita iti dveṣe dveṣo mama yukto na prerake //
SA11bsa054_u:3794: api ca / nādattaṃ kiṃcidupabhujyate sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:3795: iti vicintya parāpakāre 'pi na tatra cittaṃ pradūṣayedityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3798: pūrvaṃ janmāntare mayāpi sattvānāmevaṃvidhaiva pīḍā kṛtā yasmāt,
SA11bsa054_u:3801: yadyasya kāraṇaṃ tasmādetadutpadyate nānyasmāditi parāmṛśya parāpakāraṃ marṣayedityupadaśaryannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3802: tacchasraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:3803: tena śasraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.43 //
SA11bsa054_u:3806: tathāhi tasyāpakāriṇaḥ śastraṃ khaṅgādi mama kāyaśca,
SA11bsa054_u:3815: yataḥ svayamapi duḥkhakāraṇaṃ vahatyupanayati ca bhavān /
SA11bsa054_u:3816: ātmanyakope paratrāpi na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3819: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.44 //
SA11bsa054_u:3823: duḥkhaparihārāya sukhaprāptaye ca yā tṛṣṇā abhilāṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3824: tadandhena pihitaprajñālocanena tasyāṃ vyathāyāṃ satyāṃ kutra kupyate?
SA11bsa054_u:3825: na hi gaṇḍasya kuḍyādisaṃparkaje duḥkhe kvacidvivekataḥ kopo yuktaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3832: tasya punaḥ kāraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pratyapakāriṇaṃ cecchāmi /
SA11bsa054_u:3836: ātmavadhāya svayaṃ saṃskṛtaśastrasyaiva anyatra mama kopo na yukta ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3838: matkarmajanitā eva tathedaṃ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.46 //
SA11bsa054_u:3843: vane tasminnivāsino gṛdhrolūkavāyasādayaḥ pakṣiṇo yathā matkarmajanitā eva duḥkhahetavo bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3849: yena yāsyanti narakānmayaivāmī hatā nanu // Bca_6.47 //
SA11bsa054_u:3850: yena madīyena karmaṇā coditāḥ preritā eva mayi pūrvakṛtāpakāre apakāriṇo jātāḥ santo narakān yāsyanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3854: tadā ete 'pi nāpakāriṇo 'bhaviṣyanniti matkṛtenaiva karmaṇā apakāriṇo bhavanti //
SA11bsa054_u:3856: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa054_u:3857: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // Bca_6.48 //
SA11bsa054_u:3860: etānapakāriṇa āśritya nimittīkṛtya mama pāpaṃ pūrvajanmakṛtaparāpakārajanitaṃ kṣīyate tadduḥkhānubhavanavipākena kṣayaṃ yāti /
SA11bsa054_u:3863: māmāśritya matkarmacoditāḥ evamapyapakāraṃ kṛtvā punarete narakān tīvravedanān duḥsahaduḥkhānubhavān yānti /
SA11bsa054_u:3864: ata uktakrameṇa ahameva apakārī eṣāmityādi subodham //
SA11bsa054_u:3869: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // Bca_6.50 //
SA11bsa054_u:3872: na tu punareṣāṃ durāśayatayā narakeṣu mamāpatanamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3874: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadyahamapakārī sannapi kenacidupāyakauśalena narakān na yāmi,
SA11bsa054_u:3881: na caitāvatā kiṃcideṣāṃ nyūnādhikaṃ guṇadoṣeṣu syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3884: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3885: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // Bca_6.51 //
SA11bsa054_u:3888: na kaścideṣāṃ pratīkāro narakagamanādiṣu kṛtaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3890: tathā sarvasattveṣu na maitracittaṃ mayā niści[kṣepta?]tavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:3893: tasmādetarhi pratīkāropāyābhāvāttapasvino varākā rakśitumaśakyatvānnaṣṭā durgatipatitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:3895: paścāttadupāyamadhigamya tatkariṣyāmi yathaiṣāṃ duḥkhamaṇumātrakamapi na syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3899: dvividhaṃ duḥkhamavicārato bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:3900: tatra manasi na kaściddaṇḍādikaṃ dātuṃ śaktaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3902: iti tadudbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ paramārthato na saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3905: mamedaṃ śarīramiti vikalpābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt kāyaduḥkhena cittaṃ vihanyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3908: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // Bca_6.53 //
SA11bsa054_u:3910: na hi kāyasyāyaṃ kaṃcidupaghātaṃ karotīti yena,
SA11bsa054_u:3912: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nyakkārādayaḥ kāyasya bādhakā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3915: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3916: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // Bca_6.54 //
SA11bsa054_u:3920: sa kiṃ māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati ihaloke paraloka vā,
SA11bsa054_u:3925: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // Bca_6.55 //
SA11bsa054_u:3933: tannimittaṃ nyakkārādikartṛṣu krudhyato yatpāpaṃ tadeva paraṃ sthāsyati paralokānubandhi bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3937: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // Bca_6.56 //
SA11bsa054_u:3938: idameva varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yallābhābhāvādasminnevāhani me maraṇamastu,
SA11bsa054_u:3939: na tu punaḥ parāpakāradvāreṇa lābhapratilambhānmithyājīvitaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālam /
SA11bsa054_u:3940: kutaḥ? yasmādvahutarakālamapi jīvitvā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam ityavaśyaṃbhāvino mṛtyorduḥkhaṃ tadeva mama /
SA11bsa054_u:3944: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3945: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // Bca_6.57 //
SA11bsa054_u:3951: anayordvayorapi svapnopalabdhopabhuktasukhayoḥ prativibuddhayoḥ satoḥ tadupalabdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ na nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:3958: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:3959: riktahastaśca nagraśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // Bca_6.59 //
SA11bsa054_u:3965: kaṭisūtrakamātramapi na pariśeṣitamiti nagnaśca cauraiḥ parimuṣita iva asmāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ yāsyāmi //
SA11bsa054_u:3966: syādetat- astyeva viśeṣo lābhasya cīvarādīnāmanupaghātādāyuḥsaṃskārāṇāmupastambhācciratarakālaṃ jīvitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3967: tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca vṛddhiṃ kuryām / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:3970: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3971: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3972: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase /
SA11bsa054_u:3973: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3974: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // Bca_6.60 //
SA11bsa054_u:3975: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3977: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ- akṣāntisamudbhavasya pāpasya rāśirabhivardhate //
SA11bsa054_u:3978: athāpi syāt- yathākathaṃcit tāvaccirakālaṃ lābhājjīvitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3985: tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena?
SA11bsa054_u:3991: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // Bca_6.62 //
SA11bsa054_u:4009: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4012: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4019: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // Bca_6.64 //
SA11bsa054_u:4023: kutaḥ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:4026: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām /
SA11bsa054_u:4038: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4043: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato 'pi na doṣa iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:4045: kiṃ ca / idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4047: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // Bca_6.66 //
SA11bsa054_u:4049: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4054: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4056: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā /
SA11bsa054_u:4060: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
SA11bsa054_u:4062: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām //
SA11bsa054_u:4063: tadānīmubhayorapi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇatayā kvacidapi kopo na yukta iti kathayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4065: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // Bca_6.67 //
SA11bsa054_u:4071: itthaṃ brūmaḥ- kam eṣu kleśarākṣasāveśavaśīkṛteṣu nirdoṣam,
SA11bsa054_u:4074: (Bcp 99) idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4075: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4083: tathāpi pratīkāro yukta ityāha- sarva ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:4084: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko 'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya? na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:4087: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa054_u:4088: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // Bca_6.69 //
SA11bsa054_u:4089: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:4090: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
SA11bsa054_u:4092: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti //
SA11bsa054_u:4093: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4098: ekasmin gṛhe 'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4100: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4103_0: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate
SA11bsa054_u:4103_1: dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena
SA11bsa054_u:4107: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt /
SA11bsa054_u:4116: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:4117: tathā yo 'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4123: athāpi syāt- na mayā svalpamātre 'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4126: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4128: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate?
SA11bsa054_u:4129: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:4130: kiṃ ca / yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4133: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4135: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // Bca_6.74 //
SA11bsa054_u:4136: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:4143: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4146: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha- idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam /
SA11bsa054_u:4147: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:4148: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4151: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi // Bca_6.76 //
SA11bsa054_u:4152: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
SA11bsa054_u:4153: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4158: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
SA11bsa054_u:4163: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa054_u:4164: na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhiḥ parāvarjanamuttamam // Bca_6.77 //
SA11bsa054_u:4167: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava,
SA11bsa054_u:4170: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4173: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye 'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:4176: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4177: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4179: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4182: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
SA11bsa054_u:4190: kiṃ ca / mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4202: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4210: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4215: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4216: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto 'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4219: satkāramitvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ kiṃ paridahyase // Bca_6.81 //
SA11bsa054_u:4220: athavā syādetat- na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4222: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4232: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4233: kuṭumbajīvinaṃ labdhvā na hṛṣyasi prakupyasi // Bca_6.82 //
SA11bsa054_u:4234: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti,
SA11bsa054_u:4237: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4238: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na?
SA11bsa054_u:4241: tathā prakṛte 'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4245: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
SA11bsa054_u:4247: jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā //
SA11bsa054_u:4251: tathāpi yaḥ samutpāditabodhicittaḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhiṃ buddhatvamicchati,
SA11bsa054_u:4261: api ca / aparasya lābhasatkārasaṃpadabhāve 'pi na bhavatastadbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4262: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4263: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
SA11bsa054_u:4264: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim // Bca_6.84 //
SA11bsa054_u:4265: yadi nāma tena tava akṣamāviṣayeṇa sattvena taddīyamānaṃ vastu na labdham,
SA11bsa054_u:4268: sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:4274: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi // Bca_6.85 //
SA11bsa054_u:4276: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
SA11bsa054_u:4284: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato 'paritoṣaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4285: tatra puṇyādīnāṃ vārayitumaśakyatvāt labhyamānāgrahaṇe 'pi sarvathāpi na tatte 'stītyādinā bādhakasyoktatvāditi na kiṃcit paritoṣakāraṇamasti //
SA11bsa054_u:4286: athāpi syāt- parasyaiva lābhasatkārasaṃpattirasti, na mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4290: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
SA11bsa054_u:4300: (Bcp 104) yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:4301: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4305: iti kathaṃ kṛtapuṇyaiḥ saha spardhā yujyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4309: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:4321: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
SA11bsa054_u:4322: yadi nāma tavecchayā siddhaṃ niṣpannamapriyaṃ śatroḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4323: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava? na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:4325: nanu idameva prayojanaṃ yat tadduḥkhe mama saṃtuṣṭirityata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:4326: athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ // Bca_6.88 //
SA11bsa054_u:4327: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:4328: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu?
SA11bsa054_u:4333: yato narakapālāstvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti kumbhiṣu // Bca_6.89 //
SA11bsa054_u:4336: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam /
SA11bsa054_u:4339: narakapālā yamapuruṣāḥ tvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti pakṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4345: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
SA11bsa054_u:4346: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me // Bca_6.90 //
SA11bsa054_u:4355: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4365: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4368: tasmāt saumanasya heturbhavato 'pi stutyādayo bālajanānandakāriṇo 'nupādeyā eva //
SA11bsa054_u:4371_0: kecinmohapuruṣāḥ tādṛśaguṇāt svayamatisudūre vartamānā api śakrādiguṇaiḥ stūyamānā
SA11bsa054_u:4371_1: bandijanairanyaiśca protphullanayanavadanā yaśorthino hastyaśvādidhanaṃ tṛṇavat tebhyaḥ prayacchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:4372: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:4376: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham // Bca_6.92 //
SA11bsa054_u:4377: stutyādyabhidhāyakāni akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ kiṃ bhakṣyāṇi carvitavyāni?
SA11bsa054_u:4378: yaśorthaṃ mṛte sati kasya ca tat sukhaṃ yaśaḥśravaṇasamuttham?
SA11bsa054_u:4381: yathā kaścid bālo dhūlimayagṛheṇa paramaparitoṣeṇa parikrīḍamānaḥ kenacit tasmin bhagne mahadduḥkhena parigṛhītaḥ paramārtipīḍita iva madgṛhaṃ bhagnamiti karuṇasvaraṃ krandati,
SA11bsa054_u:4383: tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me // Bca_6.93 //
SA11bsa054_u:4384: tathaiva stutiyaśohānau vighāte svacittaṃ duḥkhamāviśat pratibhāsate vicārayato mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4385: atrāpi na vastusatā kenacid vipralambha iti parāmarṣṭavyam //
SA11bsa054_u:4386: (Bcp 106) punaranyathā vicāreṇa bāladharma evāyamiti caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ parāmṛśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4390: sa śabdo māṃ stauti madīyaṃ varṇamudīrayati /
SA11bsa054_u:4393: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam // Bca_6.94 //
SA11bsa054_u:4401: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11bsa054_u:4402: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ // Bca_6.95 //
SA11bsa054_u:4403: yasmādanyasmin mayi vā prītyā parasaṃtānavartinyā kimāyātaṃ mama? na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:4404: kutaḥ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā,
SA11bsa054_u:4406: ato bhāgo nālpo 'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt //
SA11bsa054_u:4408: tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti? atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4410: kasmādanyaprasādena sukhiteṣu na me sukham // Bca_6.96 //
SA11bsa054_u:4412: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite 'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam /
SA11bsa054_u:4414: na tvanyasmin prasādena sukhiteṣu mama sukham //
SA11bsa054_u:4419: tadanyanimittābhāvāt ahaṃ stuta ityevaṃ vikalpanāt prītirātmabni jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4422: ātmanyapi evamuktakrameṇa asaṃbandhādapratyāsatteḥ kāraṇāt kevalaṃ bālavilasitametat //
SA11bsa054_u:4423: (Bcp 107) api ca / stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4425: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate // Bca_6.98 //
SA11bsa054_u:4433: tadguṇāsahanatayā vā saṃpadi lābhasatkārādisvabhāvāyāṃ kopaṃ ca amarṣaṃ kurvate teṣveva /
SA11bsa054_u:4438: apāyapātarakṣārthaṃ pravṛttā nanu te mama // Bca_6.99 //
SA11bsa054_u:4440: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4442: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4447: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhādveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // Bca_6.100 //
SA11bsa054_u:4451: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4456: buddhādhiṣṭhānata iva dveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // Bca_6.101 //
SA11bsa054_u:4462: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti nanvetattadupasthitam // Bca_6.102 //
SA11bsa054_u:4463: (Bcp 108) kuśalavighātaḥ kṛto 'nena ityevaṃ manasi nidhāya atra puṇyavighātakāriṇi dveṣo na yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4464: kasmāt? yataḥ kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ sukṛtaṃ nāsti sarvaśubhakarmahetutvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4469: tatra pradveṣe tu ātmanaiva puṇyavighātaḥ kṛto bhavedityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4472: atha yadi ātmana eva doṣeṇa asahiṣṇutātmakena na karomi kṣamāṃ kṣāntimiha vighnakāriṇi,
SA11bsa054_u:4473: tadā mayaiva na punaranyena atra puṇye kṛto vighnaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4479: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4480: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate // Bca_6.104 //
SA11bsa054_u:4481: yo bhāvaḥ kāryābhimataḥ yena kāraṇābhimatena vinā nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:4486: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4487: tathāvidhe 'pi tathā vyavahāraṃ kurvato nāsti vipratipattiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4490: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate // Bca_6.105 //
SA11bsa054_u:4491: na yasmāt kasyaciddānapaterditsākāle eva saṃprāptenārthinā yācanakena dānavighnaḥ kṛtaḥ ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4493: tathā kasyacit pravrajitukāmasya pravrājakasamavadhānaṃ pravrajyā saṃvarādigrahaṇasvabhāvā,
SA11bsa054_u:4498: api ca / kṣāntiheturatidurlabha iti tatsamāgame prītireva yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4500: atipracuraprāptikā yācanakā loke sarvatra sarveṣāṃ dīyamānagrahaṇāvaimukhyāt,
SA11bsa054_u:4503: yadi kathaṃcit kaścit syādvā na veti /
SA11bsa054_u:4506: (Bcp 109) yasmādanaparādhasya nivṛttaparāpakārasya mama nirnimittaṃ na kaścideko 'pi aparādhyati,
SA11bsa054_u:4513: tasmād gṛhe prādurbhūto nidhiriva śramamantareṇaivādhigato ripurabhilaṣaṇīya eva mayā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:4515: evaṃvidhe paramapuruṣārthe sāhāyyaṃ bhajamānasya pratyupakārakaraṇameva kṛtajñatayā mama yuktamityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4517: etasmai prathamaṃ deyametatpūrvā kṣamā yataḥ // Bca_6.108 //
SA11bsa054_u:4518: yasmādasau tatra sāhāyyaṃ kurvan kāraṇameva na vighnaḥ tasmānmayā kṣamāmabhyastatā,
SA11bsa054_u:4522: kṣamāphalaṃ dharmādhigamalakṣaṇam etasmai dharmasahāyāya prathamamagrato dātavyaṃ mayā iti praṇidhātavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4525: eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:4529: kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4533: tena kāraṇena kuśalaheturapi yadi śatruḥ pūjanīyo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4534: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo 'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4535: so 'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4539: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // Bca_6.110 //
SA11bsa054_u:4541: ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4542: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:4553: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // Bca_6.111 //
SA11bsa054_u:4555: ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya duṣṭāśayameva pratītya nimittīkṛtya samupajāyate kṣamā /
SA11bsa054_u:4557: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4560: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kiṃ mamānena āśayavicāreṇa prayojanam?
SA11bsa054_u:4570: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // Bca_6.112 //
SA11bsa054_u:4575: kutaḥ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4576: syādetat- yadi nāma sattvā api sarvasaṃpattihetavaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4577: tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4579: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // Bca_6.113 //
SA11bsa054_u:4580: ubhayebhyo 'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe /
SA11bsa054_u:4582: ataḥ sādhāraṇe 'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat,
SA11bsa054_u:4586: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve 'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4587: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4588: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // Bca_6.114 //
SA11bsa054_u:4590: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4591: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4603: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // Bca_6.116 //
SA11bsa054_u:4605: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi /
SA11bsa054_u:4618: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // Bca_6.117 //
SA11bsa054_u:4623: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam /
SA11bsa054_u:4631: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // Bca_6.119 //
SA11bsa054_u:4633: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:4636: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4637: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4639: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
SA11bsa054_u:4640: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya /
SA11bsa054_u:4642: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4643: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:4645: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4646: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu //
SA11bsa054_u:4648: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapeikṣāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4649: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // Bca_6.121 //
SA11bsa054_u:4650: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva /
SA11bsa054_u:4655: tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam,
SA11bsa054_u:4659: ito 'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4660: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11bsa054_u:4662: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti,
SA11bsa054_u:4663: yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti /
SA11bsa054_u:4672: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // Bca_6.123 //
SA11bsa054_u:4673: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4676: tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām //
SA11bsa054_u:4680: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // Bca_6.124 //
SA11bsa054_u:4686: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya //
SA11bsa054_u:4689: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ // Bca_6.125 //
SA11bsa054_u:4690: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi /
SA11bsa054_u:4691: te 'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu /
SA11bsa054_u:4693: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu //
SA11bsa054_u:4694: (Bcp 114) bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti prasādhayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4695: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
SA11bsa054_u:4696: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // Bca_6.126 //
SA11bsa054_u:4697: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:4702: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4714: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // Bca_6.128 //
SA11bsa054_u:4718: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4721: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
SA11bsa054_u:4726: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // Bca_6.129 //
SA11bsa054_u:4737: na tu punaḥ sattvāprasaktiphalasya rājāparādhaphalena samānatā samastītyāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4743: kiṃbhūtam? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4747: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // Bca_6.133 //
SA11bsa054_u:4749: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // Bca_6.134 //
SA11bsa054_u:4750: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4753: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4754: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
SA11bsa054_u:4755: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // Bca_7.1 //
SA11bsa054_u:4774: yo 'yaṃ kuśalakarmaṇi dānādau śrutādau ca samudyamaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4777: vipakṣeṇopahataṃ vīryamanaṅgamevābhimatasiddhaye iti tadvipakṣamapanayanāya darśayitumāha- tadvipakṣa ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:4778: tasya vīryasya viruddho vināśāya pakṣo vipakṣaḥ ka ucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4814: adyāpi etāṃ daśāṃ prāpto 'pi mṛtyormukhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ san kimiti na vetsi?
SA11bsa054_u:4818: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // Bca_7.5 //
SA11bsa054_u:4826: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha- yadi nāmaivam,
SA11bsa054_u:4829: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // Bca_7.6 //
SA11bsa054_u:4830: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4832: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma avaśyaṃbhāvitā mṛtyoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4836: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena /
SA11bsa054_u:4839: tadā mṛtyumukhāntargataḥ asamaye ālasyaṃ tyaktvāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4848: idaṃ yadanāgate kartavyatayā manasikṛtaṃ tanna prāptam /
SA11bsa054_u:4854: hato 'smīti vicintayan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasītyanāgatena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4857: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4858: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4864: maraṇasamayopasthitakṛtāntānucaramukhāni ca saroṣaparuṣabhṛkuṭīni saṃpaśyan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4865: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ /

SA11bsa054_u:5968: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchasi nirvṛtim // Bca_8.43 //
SA11bsa054_u:5970: purā dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā mukhaṃ jālikayāvṛtam // Bca_8.44 //
SA11bsa054_u:5974: tadadya bhakṣitaṃ yāvat kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasi // Bca_8.46 //
SA11bsa054_u:5978: tairgṛdhrairanyaiśca gomāyuprabhṛtibhirmāṃsocchrayaṃ māṃsapuñjamimaṃ bhakṣitaṃ bībhatsaṃ dṛṣṭvā kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasīti yojayitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:5979: kimidānīṃ palāyase iti vā vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5982: niścalādapi kāṣṭhaloṣṭhasamānāt tava trāso jāyate iti kākkā pṛcchati /
SA11bsa054_u:5984: evamapi bībhatsarūpāt īkṣitāt dṛṣṭāt yadi vā evaṃ trāsaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5986: yadevaṃ calataḥ kathaṃ na trāsa ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5987: vetāleneva kenāpi cālyamānādbhayaṃ na kim // Bca_8.48 //
SA11bsa054_u:5988: bhūtagraheṇa cālyamānāt jīvataścalataḥ kiṃ na bhayaṃ bhavati?
SA11bsa054_u:5993: tatrāmedhyamaniṣṭaṃ te lālāpānaṃ kathaṃ priyam // Bca_8.49 //
SA11bsa054_u:6009: kutaḥ? daurgandhyamaśuciniṣyandaṃ na muñcantīti kṛtvā aśuciparipūrite strīkalevare eva ramante /
SA11bsa054_u:6015: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucitvamamedhye strīkalevare ca sādhāraṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:6019: na cetprayojanaṃ tena kasmācchannaṃ vimṛdyate // Bca_8.51 //
SA11bsa054_u:6025: atha tathābhūte sarvathā vaimukhyameva te nācchannena kiṃcit prayojanaṃ tavāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:6026: yadyevam, tarhi kasmāddhetoḥ channaṃ viśeṣeṇa mṛdyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6028: api ca / idamapi praṣṭavyastvam- kiṃ bhavānaśucivirāgo na veti /
SA11bsa054_u:6045: atha śucau rāga iti dvitīyo vikalpaḥ svīkriyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6048: anyathāvatāryateyaduktaṃ pareṇa- channe carmādinā rāgo bhavati nācchanne /
SA11bsa054_u:6050: yadi tena hetunā carmādinā pihitatvāditi kṛtvā aśucau rāgo bhavati bhavataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6063: acetanaṃ svabhāvena māṃsaṃ tvaṃ kathamicchasi // Bca_8.54 //
SA11bsa054_u:6071: ityevaṃ tatpralobhāt pratyupakāradhiyā vā draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca vāñchasi,
SA11bsa054_u:6075: na tu punaryathāpare varṇayanti- caitanyayogādacetanamapi cetanamabhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6076: tādṛśaṃ māṃsaṃ tvamacetanasvabhāvaṃ kāmukaḥ san kathamicchasi?
SA11bsa054_u:6078: tathā ca sati bhavānapi na cetanaḥ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:6081: yadicchasi na taccittaṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6082: yacca śakyaṃ na tadvetti kiṃ tadāliṅgase mudhā // Bca_8.55 //
SA11bsa054_u:6085: yacca māṃsādisvabhāvaṃ kalevaraṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6096: svāmedhyamayameva tvaṃ taṃ nāvaiṣīti vismayaḥ // Bca_8.56 //
SA11bsa054_u:6102: yat svasyātmano 'medhyamayaṃ tvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ nāvaiṣi nāvagacchasi //
SA11bsa054_u:6120: yadi te nāśucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṅgase param /
SA11bsa054_u:6125: tadeva amedhyaṃ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasvabhāvaṃ bījaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
SA11bsa054_u:6126: tena vardhitamiti tena amedhyena mātṛpītāśitasya vāntakalpasya rasena vardhitaṃ garbhasthitamupabṛṃhitam /
SA11bsa054_u:6157: śmaśāne patitān ghorān kāyān paśyāparānapi // Bca_8.63 //
SA11bsa054_u:6164: vikhāditakavinīlakavipūyakādisvabhāvatayā bībhatsān bhayaṃkarān vā aparāniti ato 'dhikān //
SA11bsa054_u:6165: kiṃ ca / prakṛtyā vikṛta evāyaṃ kāyo nābhiratisthānaṃ yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6167: kathaṃ jñātvāpi tatraiva punarutpadyate ratiḥ // Bca_8.64 //
SA11bsa054_u:6171: evaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ viditvāpi kathaṃ tasminneva sthāne bhayasthānatvena ekadā pratipanne punaranyadā jāyate ratirabhiṣvaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6172: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucisvabhāvatā kāyasya adhyakṣasiddhā,
SA11bsa054_u:6180: ataḥ kasmāt parakīyena gandhena candanasamudbhūtena anyatra yasyāsau gandho na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6191: evaṃ guṇasaṃbhave 'pi kiṃ kāraṇamanarthapriyo lokaḥ taṃ kāyaṃ gandhenānulimpati?
SA11bsa054_u:6200: atha tadvaśāt tasmin kamanīyatāmupādāya abhiratirutpadyate ityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6216: yadi kāyaḥ prakṛtyā bhīṣaṇaḥ pretānāmiva svabhāvena bhayaṃkaraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6225: ātmanaiva saṃcintya ātmano vyāmohamutpādayituṃ yatnavadbhiḥ unmattairasvasthacittaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6226: evaṃ ca viparītakarmānuṣṭhānānnaite varākāḥ sacetasa iti khedaṃ karoti śāsrakāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6227: na cātra kaścidātmajño dṛśyata iti unmattairākulā samākīrṇā mahī pṛthivīti //
SA11bsa054_u:6229: kaṅkālān katicidṛṣṭvā śmaśāne kila te ghṛṇā /
SA11bsa054_u:6233: etaduktaṃ bhavati- carmaṇyutpāṭite [8. 64] ityādikamuktvā yaduktaṃ kathaṃ jñātvāpītyādi,
SA11bsa054_u:6241: tadeva śarīraṃ śmaśāne ghṛṇāsthānagrāme vā abhiratisthānamiti kākvā brūte /
SA11bsa054_u:6248: tathā ca evaṃ vidhamapi draviṇavikalasya naitat sulabhamityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6251: vinā mūlyaṃ dravyamantareṇa na labhyate na prāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6259: yātyarjanena tāruṇyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kāmaiḥ karoti kim // Bca_8.72 //
SA11bsa054_u:6262: kena dhanena prakāreṇa vā asau bālo yauvane yuvāvasthāyāṃ sukhī syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:6264: yadapi kasyacit pitṛpitāmahopārjitadhanena yauvane sukhitvaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6268: tadarjayata eva galitavayaso na kaścidupayogo viṣayairiti //
SA11bsa054_u:6269: athāpi syāt- tadarjayatāpi kāmasukhamanubhūyata eva, ityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6271: gṛhamāgatya sāyāhne śerate sma mṛtā iva // Bca_8.73 //
SA11bsa054_u:6273: astaṃ gate savitari svagṛhamāgatya gāḍhamiddhākrāntatvāt mṛtakalpāḥ śerate sma svapanti /
SA11bsa054_u:6291: vatsarairapi anekavarṣātyaye 'pi putrān dārāṃśca nekṣante na paśyanti /
SA11bsa054_u:6296: tanna prāptaṃ mudhaivāyurnītaṃ tu parakarmaṇā // Bca_8.75 //
SA11bsa054_u:6297: yadarthaṃ sukhapratilambhanimittaṃ vikrītaḥ paradāsīkṛtaḥ ātmā kāmaviḍambitaiḥ tanna prāptam,
SA11bsa054_u:6298: taditi sukhaṃ na prāptaṃ na pratilabdham /
SA11bsa054_u:6299: āyuḥsaṃskārā eva hi kevalamanarthakaṃ parakarmānuṣṭhānena kṣayamupanītāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6300: na sādhukarmaṇi kvacidapi yojitā iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6304: sukhabubhukṣayā vikrītaḥ parāyattīkṛtaḥ svātmabhāva svakāyo yaiste tathā, teṣām /
SA11bsa054_u:6313: mānārthaṃ dāsatāṃ yānti mūḍhāḥ kāmaviḍambitāḥ // Bca_8.77 //
SA11bsa054_u:6316: tatra praviṣṭasya jīvitaṃ syādvā na veti jīvitasya saṃdeho 'sminniti kṛtvā /
SA11bsa054_u:6323: ke te? kāmabiḍambitāḥ kāmāya kāmena vā viḍambitāstiraskṛtāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6325: ihaiva janmani kāmāsaktacetasāṃ yadduḥkhaṃ dṛśyate tatkathayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6330: kiṃ ca / ayaṃ sukhasādhanatvena upādīyamāno 'pi ca anarthaparaṃparāprasūtiheturevārthaḥ iti kathayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6335: tathā rakṣitasyāpi kathaṃcit taskarādibhirnāśādviṣādo daurmanasyaṃ paritāpaheturanarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6337: ityevamarjanādibhiḥ sarvadā vyākulatvāt dhanāsaktacetasāṃ kṣaṇamapi samādhānānavakāśatvāt nāvasaraḥ saṃsārāśṛ[śri?
SA11bsa054_u:6351: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya atitucchasya sukhāsvādaleśasya paśorapi sādhāraṇāsyārthe tasya nimittam /
SA11bsa054_u:6363: kāyasyārthe kṛto yo 'yaṃ sarvakālaṃ pariśramaḥ // Bca_8.82 //
SA11bsa054_u:6369: kāyasya ātmaśarīrasyārthe sukhotpādanāya yo 'yaṃ narakādiduḥkhamavigaṇayya kṛtaḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃsārasya pūrvasyāṃ koṭau pariśramaḥ prayāsaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6371: tatastasmāt pariśramāt koṭiśatenāpi pariśramabhāgena aṃśena buddhatvaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:6375: caryāduḥkhānmahadduḥkhaṃ sā ca bodhirna kāminām // Bca_8.83 //
SA11bsa054_u:6376: caryāduḥkhamapekṣya idameva mahadduḥkhaṃ yatkāmārthe caratāṃ saṃsāre teṣāmavīcyādinarakapatanāt,
SA11bsa054_u:6378: na tu bodhisattvānāṃ pratiniyatakālaṃ svecchayā tadanubhavatām /
SA11bsa054_u:6379: tadevaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāmapi kāmārthe kāmināṃ sā ca bodhirna bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6382: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnirna prapāto na vairiṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6384: amī śastrādayo duḥkhajanakatvena prasiddhā na sādṛśyaṃ bhajante prati kāmānām /
SA11bsa054_u:6385: kasmāt? narakādidurgatiduḥkhasya āgamāt pratipannasya smaraṇāt smaraṇenāmukhīkaraṇāt /
SA11bsa054_u:6387: kāmāstu dīrghakālikatīvranarakādiduḥkhahetava iti kīdṛśī tairupamā bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:6388: tadevaṃ kāyavivekānantaraṃ cittavivekaṃ pratipādya prakṛte yojayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6391: evamuktakrameṇa udvijya saṃtrāsaṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaviveke ratimabhiratimutpādayet /
SA11bsa054_u:6398: niḥśabdasaumyavanamārutavījyamānaiḥ caṃkramyate parahitāya vicintyate ca // Bca_8.86 //
SA11bsa054_u:6401: śaśāṅkasya candramasaḥ karā raśmaya eva śuklatāśaityasādharmyāccandanānīva,
SA11bsa054_u:6402: taiḥ śītalāni yāni ślātalāni teṣu caṃkramyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6411: vījyamānāḥ taiścaṃkramyata iti parāvṛttyā punaḥ punarmandaṃ bhramyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6413: kiṃ tu parahitāya sattvānāṃ sukhotpādanāya vicintyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6418: vihṛtya yatra kvacidiṣṭakālaṃ śūnyālaye vṛkṣatale guhāsu /
SA11bsa054_u:6429: upaśāntavitarkaḥ san bodhicittaṃ tu bhāvayet // Bca_8.89 //
SA11bsa054_u:6433: iti hi sarvasukhasaṃpattiheturviveka iti cetasi punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇāddhetoḥ upaśānto vitarkaḥ asanmanasikāro yasya saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6435: evaṃ pariśuddhe cetasi bhāvyamānaṃ bodhicittaṃ prakarṣapadamadhirohatīti viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena darśayati //
SA11bsa054_u:6437: na tāvat parahitasukhāya samyak cittaṃ calati,
SA11bsa054_u:6449: ato yathā mama duḥkhaṃ bādhakaṃ tathā eṣāmapi /
SA11bsa054_u:6461: karacaraṇaśiraḥprabhṛtibhedādanekaprakāraḥ kāyo yathikatvenādhyavasitaḥ paripālanīyo bhavati duḥkhanivartanāt sukhopadhānācca,
SA11bsa054_u:6469: tadā kathamiva bhavato duḥkhamanyasaṃtāneṣu na bādhakaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:6473: anyeṣu apareṣu śarīreṣu mama duḥkhaṃ yadi nāma prabādhakaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6481: ataḥ svaparaviśeṣamapāsya duḥkhasvabhāvataiva nivartanahetuḥ / ata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:6505: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca tulyameva sukhaṃ priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:6506: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yenātraiva sukhodyama // Bca_8.95 //
SA11bsa054_u:6509: naiva kaścit yena tatraiva ātmanyeva sukhotpādanāya tātparyaṃ na parasminnityarthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6511: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:6512: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram // Bca_8.96 //
SA11bsa054_u:6515: syādetat- yadi nāma duḥkhātmakatā na viśiṣyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6518: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6520: tasya parasya duḥkhena mama bādhā pīḍā nāstītyato 'smāt kāraṇād yadi na rakṣyate 'nyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6522: yato nāgāminaḥ kāyasya paralokabhāvino narakādijātasya duḥkhātmakasya [duḥkhānme] tasyopāttasya kāyasya kācidbādhā saṃbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6526: yata evam, tasmāt kenābhiprāyeṇa asau rakṣyate?
SA11bsa054_u:6527: kāya iti prakṛtatvāt pāpānnivartanāt kuśale pravartanācca //
SA11bsa054_u:6532: ātmano nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt nirastatvācca leśataḥ tatko 'yamahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:6541: anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate // Bca_8.98 //
SA11bsa054_u:6544: tadā na khalu yadeva skandhapañcakamiha vinaśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:6546: api tu apūrvameva pūrvanivṛttau tatra idaṃpratyayatāviśiṣṭaṃ kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtamantarābhavasaṃtatyā samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6549: yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam /
SA11bsa054_u:6550: pādaduḥkhaṃ na hastasya kasmāttattena rakṣyate // Bca_8.99 //
SA11bsa054_u:6553: tato yadā anyadduḥkhamanyasya rakṣituṃ na yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6554: tadā kathaṃ pādādau prahāraṃ patantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hastaṃ prasārya rakṣyate?
SA11bsa054_u:6562: yato yadayuktaṃ yuktyā saṃgataṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6563: tannivartyamapasāryaṃ svakīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca yathābalaṃ yathāsāmarthyam /
SA11bsa054_u:6568: tadetaddvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamihaloke paraloke ca ātmaduḥkhāpaharaṇāderniyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:6572: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati // Bca_8.101 //
SA11bsa054_u:6573: saṃtāno nāma na kaścidekaḥ paramārthasan saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:6576: tasmādeteṣāmeva kṣaṇānāmekapadena pratipādanāya saṃketo kṛto buddhairvyavahārārthaṃ saṃtāna iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6579: anyathā ātmanā kimaparāddhaṃ yenāsau na svīkriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6580: evaṃ samudāyo 'pi na samudāyibhyo vastusan eko vidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6582: tattvānyatvavikalpastu asya avayavivicāreṇaiva gata iti neha pratāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6588: yathā anekeṣāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ svarūpamantareṇa paṅktirnāsti straksūtravadekāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6589: yathā ca hastyaśvapadātiprabhṛtibhyo militebhyo vyatiriktā nānyā senā kācidekā tatrāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:6591: etacca anyatra [9.73] vistareṇa vicāritamiti neha vicāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:6594: evamātmādeḥ svāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvād yasya saṃbandhi duḥkhaṃ sa nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:6598: tadā kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhaviṣyati ātmavaditi ātmasattvavaditi ca?
SA11bsa054_u:6605: tadā tadabhiprāyeṇaiva svaparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tatpratyāyanārthaṃ sādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaścocyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6608: idamupāttapañcaskandhamātramabhisaṃdhāya dṛṣṭānte dīyamāne na kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6619: duḥkhatvādeva svaparāvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāryāṇi niṣedhyāni bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:6623: yena svakīyāni ca vāryāṇi na parakīyānīti /
SA11bsa054_u:6624: evaṃ duḥkhatvāditi heturanaikāntiko na bhavatīti samarthitam //
SA11bsa054_u:6625: nanu yadi duḥkhī nāma na kaścit saṃsāre saṃbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6629: vāryaṃ cetsarvamapyevaṃ na cedātmāpi sattvavat // Bca_8.103 //
SA11bsa054_u:6637: na ca abhyupagamamātreṇa tasya sattā prasidhyati tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:6645: tadvaraṃ bahuduḥkhanidānaṃ saiva prathamato notpādayituṃ yujyata iti paravacanāvakāśaṃ śaṅkamāna āha-
SA11bsa054_u:6649: jagadduḥkhaṃ nirūpyedaṃ kṛpāduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu // Bca_8.104 //
SA11bsa054_u:6650: jagato duḥkhaṃ narakādikṛtamanekaprakāraṃ samīkṣya idaṃ kṛpākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu?
SA11bsa054_u:6655: ekasya puruṣasya duḥkhena bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ vigacchati nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:6660: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt // Bca_8.106 //
SA11bsa054_u:6661: yata eva utpādyameva tadduḥkhaṃ kṛpālunā svaparātmanoḥ ata eva supuṣpacandreṇa bodhisattvena /
SA11bsa054_u:6669: yaduktaṃ supuṣpacandrasyetivṛttake [samādhi. 35]- tathā hi- atīte 'dhvani ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
SA11bsa054_u:6670: sa bhagavān buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā ciratarakālamavasthāya parinirvṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6671: tasmiṃśca parinirvṛte śāsanāntardhānasamaye rājā śūradatto nāma babhūva /
