SA11bsa054_u:7128: yadi ca bhāvasyaiva kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7131: ato na bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ abhāvo nāma kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:7132: na ca bhāvābhāvayoruktakrameṇa asattve pratipādite tadubhayasaṃkīrṇātmatā saṃbhavati ubhayapratiṣedhasvabhāvatā vā,
SA11bsa054_u:7134: tasminnirākṛte sarva eva amī ekaprahāreṇa nirastā bhavantīti / tasmāt-
SA11bsa054_u:7139: subhūtirāha- ihāyuṣman śāradvatīputra bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyamiti prajānāti, saṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7144: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jivhā kāyo manaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7166: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sarva eva amī ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca bhāvāḥ svabhāvadvayamābibhrataḥ samupajāyante yaduta sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:7175: samyagdṛśāṃ yo viṣayaḥ sa tattvaṃ mṛṣādṛśāṃ saṃvṛtisatyamuktam //
SA11bsa054_u:7182: idameva satyadvayaṃ nānyat satyamastīti avadhāraṇārtho 'pi yujyate cakāraḥ / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:7187: satya ime duvi lokavidūnāṃ diṣṭa svayaṃ aśruṇitva pareṣām /
SA11bsa054_u:7188: saṃvṛti yā ca tathā paramārtho satyu na sidhyati kiṃ ca tṛtīyu //
SA11bsa054_u:7190: nanu catvāri āryasatyāni duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇāni abhidharme kathitāni bhagavatā,
SA11bsa054_u:7191: tat kathaṃ dve eva satye iti?
SA11bsa054_u:7192: satyam, kiṃ tarhi vaineyajanāśayānuśayavaśādete dve eva catvāri kṛtvā kathitāni (kathite?)
SA11bsa054_u:7197: syādetat- saṃvṛtiravidyopadarśitātmatayā abhūtasamāropasvarūpatvādvicārāt śataśo viśīryamāṇāpi kathaṃ satyamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:7202: ata eva lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti śāstre 'pi viśeṣa ukta ācāryapādaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7206: ekameva bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta apramoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:7211: paramārthasatyaṃ tu na jñāyate kīdṛk kiṃsvabhāvaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:7215: kenacit prakāreṇa tat sarvabuddhiviṣayīkartuṃ na śakyate iti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:7218: ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet?
SA11bsa054_u:7220: vikalpajanmāno hi śabdā vikalpadhiyāmaviṣaye na pravartitumutsahante /
SA11bsa054_u:7222: tathāpi bhājanaśrotṛjanānugrahārthaṃ parikalpamupādāya saṃvṛtyā nidarśanopadarśanena kiṃcidabhidhīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7223: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7224: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano 'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate,
SA11bsa054_u:7226: yadā punarasau taimirikaḥ ataimirikāya svābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati- keśāniha paśyāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:7227: tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti- nātra keśāḥ santīti /
SA11bsa054_u:7229: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7234: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena,
SA11bsa054_u:7240: iti paramārthato 'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam /
SA11bsa054_u:7241: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:7242: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA11bsa054_u:7256: nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7263: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7267: yadi hi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavāṅyanasāṃ viṣayatāmupagacchet,
SA11bsa054_u:7279: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:7291: yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśo na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:7297: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko 'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha- tatra loke ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7298: tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
SA11bsa054_u:7299: tatra prākṛtako loko yogilokena bādhyate // Bca_9.3 //
SA11bsa054_u:7310: so 'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7313: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7316: syādetat- ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate?
SA11bsa054_u:7317: kaḥ punaranayoḥ kena bādhyata ityāha- tatretyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7320: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate,
SA11bsa054_u:7328: idamihābhimatam- yathā vibhramāhitasadbhāvaṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣaḥ asadbhūtakeśoṇḍukādidarśino jñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastutattvagrāhiṇo 'taimirikajñānena bādhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7337: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7344: uttare ca uttare ca uttarottarāḥ, taiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7350: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena /
SA11bsa054_u:7353: tathā hi- pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:7358: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
SA11bsa054_u:7365: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7369: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7370: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:7371: te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7372: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7375: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7377: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:7378: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:7385: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7386: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7387: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7399: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7400: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:7403: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7411: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7412: na tu māyāvadityatra vivādo yogilokayoḥ // Bca_9.5 //
SA11bsa054_u:7414: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7417: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7423: na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7425: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7426: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7428: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:7429: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7434: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:7435: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7439: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7440: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7450: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam,
SA11bsa054_u:7454: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7461: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7464: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7469: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7475: tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite saṃvṛtyā cedvirudhyate // Bca_9.7 //
SA11bsa054_u:7476: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya /
SA11bsa054_u:7480: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7487: kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7488: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7491: tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]- yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7494: saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:7496: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:7497: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:7503: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7509: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7519: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7530: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7532: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
SA11bsa054_u:7547: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7550: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase?
SA11bsa054_u:7553: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7555: tathātra parameva paripṛcchati- sadbhāve 'pi kathaṃ yatheti /
SA11bsa054_u:7558: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7564: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam //
SA11bsa054_u:7566: idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7567: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ // Bca_9.9 //
SA11bsa054_u:7572: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7584: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7603: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate?
SA11bsa054_u:7611: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7618: samāne 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne 'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7621: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham,
SA11bsa054_u:7623: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7638: ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7639: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7646: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:7650: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7655: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7656: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7660: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7663: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
SA11bsa054_u:7669: tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7670: buddho 'pi saṃsaredevaṃ tataḥ kiṃ bodhicaryayā // Bca_9.13 //
SA11bsa054_u:7671: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:7672: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā?
SA11bsa054_u:7676: sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7682: pratyayānāṃ tu vicchedātsaṃvṛtyāpi na saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.14 //
SA11bsa054_u:7686: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7690: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:7693: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7709: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7712: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7715: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7717: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7721_0: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:7721_1: sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:7772: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7775: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7776: yadā na bhrāntirapyasti māyā kenopalabhyate // Bca_9.15 //
SA11bsa054_u:7777: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7782: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
SA11bsa054_u:7785: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7786: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:7792: cittasyaiva sa ākāro yadyapyanyo 'sti tattvataḥ // Bca_9.16 //
SA11bsa054_u:7793: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7795: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7800: tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7801: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7804: na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:7813: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7814: yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet /
SA11bsa054_u:7815: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7817: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7818: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam,
SA11bsa054_u:7819: tadā kaḥ kasya svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:7825: kiṃ ca / uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā /
SA11bsa054_u:7829: na cchinatti yathātmānamasidhārā tathā manaḥ // Bca_9.17 //
SA11bsa054_u:7830: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7834: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:7837: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7851: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum,
SA11bsa054_u:7852: na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7853: evameva tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ draṣṭumiti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7854: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha ātmabhāvamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7856: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7857: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7859: api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7862: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7867: naiva prakāśyate dīpo yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ // Bca_9.18 //
SA11bsa054_u:7875: na ca avidyāmānasya prakāśanaṃ yuktam, asattvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7878: syādetat- ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7888: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7889: kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate upalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7891: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7893: nīlameva hi ko nīlaṃ kuryādātmānamātmanā // Bca_9.20 //
SA11bsa054_u:7904: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7907: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat /
SA11bsa054_u:7908: tathā hi (Bcp 190) sphaṭikopalo 'pi vastuto 'vasthitarūpa eva upādhisaṃnidhau na nīloparāgamanubhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:7910: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7913: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7929: tadā lokata eva bādhā bhavato bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7932: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya,
SA11bsa054_u:7935: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā,
SA11bsa054_u:7940: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7941: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7942: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate // Bca_9.22 //
SA11bsa054_u:7944: tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ prati sadṛśo dṛṣṭānta iti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7945: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva,
SA11bsa054_u:7946: iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7950: tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati /
SA11bsa054_u:7951: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7961: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7962: prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
SA11bsa054_u:7968: na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7970: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī,
SA11bsa054_u:7979: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7984: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7989: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7991: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:7992: bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8002: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8004: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam,
SA11bsa054_u:8008: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8009: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:8015: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8017: bhavato 'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8019: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye 'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ smaraṇamupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8020: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha- saṃbandhāditi /
SA11bsa054_u:8024: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna,
SA11bsa054_u:8027: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8028: na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8030: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8032_0: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya
SA11bsa054_u:8037: ?] / īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:8039: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:8048: tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8051: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8060: tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi arthasya pratītiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:8064: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:8072: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8073: iti / yathā dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurādivijñānena pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam /
SA11bsa054_u:8081: tena jñānasaṃvedanābhāvādarthānadhigamādayo 'pi doṣāḥ paramārthapakṣavādina iha nāvataranti /
SA11bsa054_u:8083: kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8096: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te /
SA11bsa054_u:8101: na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:8102: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8105: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:8109: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8111: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.27 //
SA11bsa054_u:8119: dvitīyapakṣe tu “yadā māyaiva te nāsti” [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8129: anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate //
SA11bsa054_u:8132: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati?
SA11bsa054_u:8137: tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8138: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8141: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8147: tena “yadā na bhrāntirapyasti” [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa tat prasādhya upasaṃhāreṇa darśitam /
SA11bsa054_u:8148: punarapi prakārāntareṇa paramārthasadvijñānasādhanāya paropakramamabhisaṃdhāya āha vastvāśrayaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8150: tathāhi- saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat pratipattavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8155: tadevaṃ (Bcp 195) saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:8159: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti vastvāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8185: tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha vastvāśrayeṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8192: tathāpi vastvāśrayeṇa vastusadbhūtacittasamāśrayeṇa abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:8208: astu nāma, tathāpi na bādhakānmuktirityāha grāhyamuktamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8209: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8213: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:8215: tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥ (Bcp 196)
SA11bsa054_u:8220: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8221: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite // Bca_9.30 //
SA11bsa054_u:8228: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato 'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8230: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:8232: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8234: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8239: kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8241: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
SA11bsa054_u:8242: api tu yo 'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
SA11bsa054_u:8244: so 'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
SA11bsa054_u:8245: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:8261: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve 'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8265: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
SA11bsa054_u:8273: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8274: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8279: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8281: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8289: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8299: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8300: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8301: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate / etadevāha-
SA11bsa054_u:8306: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:8308: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
SA11bsa054_u:8311: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8312: tadā nirāśrayo 'bhāvaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ // Bca_9.34 //
SA11bsa054_u:8316: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
SA11bsa054_u:8319: tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8322: athavā anyathāvatāryate- bhavatu nāma śūnyatābalādhānād bhāvavāsanāvinivṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8323: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:8325: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- sarvadharmaśūnyatā hi bhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇāya upādīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8329: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8332: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8335: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:8351: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:8356: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8358: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8360: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro 'grataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8362: nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,

SA11bsa054_u:9009: sa cātmā kalpanāsamāropitamūrtiriti ahaṃkāro 'pi tadabhāvādanāspada ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:9010: yatastato vāstu bhayaṃ yadyahaṃ nāma kiṃcana /
SA11bsa054_u:9011: ahameva na kiṃciccedbhayaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.57 //
SA11bsa054_u:9012: yatastato vā bhayābhayasthānāt astu bhavatu bhayam /
SA11bsa054_u:9015: ahaṃ nāma ahaṃpratyayavedyaṃ yatkiṃcana kiṃcidvastu syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9018: yadā punarahameva na kiṃcit na vastusat vicāryamāṇamahaṃ kiṃcit śabdavikalpamātrādanyata,
SA11bsa054_u:9022: ito 'pi vicārāt trāso nivartate iti bhāvaḥ / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9023: nāsmyahaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi na me 'sti na bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:9029: na siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyaṃ lasikāpi vā // Bca_9.58 //
SA11bsa054_u:9036: siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9043: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na medo 'strāṇi nāpyaham /
SA11bsa054_u:9044: na cāhamantranirguṇḍī gūthamūtramahaṃ na ca // Bca_9.59 //
SA11bsa054_u:9045: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na meda iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9058: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca strāyu noṣmā vāyurahaṃ na ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9059: na ca cchidrāṇyahaṃ nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā // Bca_9.60 //
SA11bsa054_u:9060: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyu noṣmā /
SA11bsa054_u:9076: na hi pareṣāmapi ekaikaśaḥ keśādayo 'haṃ pratyayavedyā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9077: samuditā api te eva kevalāḥ pūrvavat /
SA11bsa054_u:9078: na ca samuditeṣu teṣu kaścidekaḥ saṃbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9081: na ca anekeṣu ekapratyayo bhrānto yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9085_0: santi asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvakū māṃsāsthi snāyu śirā bukkā
SA11bsa054_u:9085_1: hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇāḥ āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ audarīyakaṃ yakṛt
SA11bsa054_u:9085_2: purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śliṣmapūyaśoṇitaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:9086: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattvaḥ upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9090: syādetat- yadi nāma keśādayo 'haṃpratyayavedyā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9092: yataḥ antarvyāpārapuruṣagocara eva ahaṃpratyayo 'smābhiriṣyate iti naiyāyikādayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9094: yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:9096: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam,
SA11bsa054_u:9100_0: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:9100_1: sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9112: tadyathā- sarpasya kuṇḍalāvasthānivṛttau ṛjutvāvasthāpravṛttau ca sarpatvasyobhayatrāpyavṛttiḥ / yathoktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9127: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9140: śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:9145: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
SA11bsa054_u:9147: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
SA11bsa054_u:9153: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9156: na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti / āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:9172: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9175: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:9177: tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9178: tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9183: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate // Bca_9.61 //
SA11bsa054_u:9185: śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9186: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam?
SA11bsa054_u:9188: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9192: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9196: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9198: tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9202: tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9207: yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9209: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
SA11bsa054_u:9213: tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9219: yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9220: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:9221: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:9228: kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9230: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt- yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:9233: tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
SA11bsa054_u:9236: kiṃ ca / yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9240: yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham?
SA11bsa054_u:9243: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā,
SA11bsa054_u:9244: kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9245: tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9246: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ // Bca_9.64 //
SA11bsa054_u:9247: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9251: eka eva svabhāvaḥ ubhayātmakaḥ kalpanāsamāropitavyapadeśāt [rūpabhedena] punareka eva tathā nānābhidhānena naivābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9255: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti,
SA11bsa054_u:9258: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
SA11bsa054_u:9259: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9260: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:9261: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9262: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9266: te eva prāptajanakabhāvā api tena pūrvāparakālayoraviśiṣṭasvabhāvā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9277: svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9284: anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9286: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva (Bcp 218)
SA11bsa054_u:9289: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
SA11bsa054_u:9290: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9294: svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9306: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva svabhāvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9307: yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:9308: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9310: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9311: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam,
SA11bsa054_u:9317: tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
SA11bsa054_u:9332: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9336: katham? tayoścetanācetanayoḥ yena kāraṇena astitā samā /
SA11bsa054_u:9339: nanu ca / atrāpi sādṛśyanibandhanamiṣyate eva ekatvaṃ vastubhede 'pi /
SA11bsa054_u:9341: viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā // Bca_9.68 //
SA11bsa054_u:9343: viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9348: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
SA11bsa054_u:9349: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:9352: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9353: tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9379: tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9382: athāyamātmā cetanāyogād buddhisamavāyāt svayamacetano 'pi jño bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9385: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti,
SA11bsa054_u:9392: acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:9397: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9399: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya /
SA11bsa054_u:9407: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9410: tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9423: na hi bhikṣavaḥ kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
SA11bsa054_u:9427: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
SA11bsa054_u:9433: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9434: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.71 //
SA11bsa054_u:9435: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:9441: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9443: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9453: ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave,
SA11bsa054_u:9456: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:9462: syādetat- ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:9463: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // Bca_9.72 //
SA11bsa054_u:9472: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9478: tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9482: sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa saṃbhavo na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9484: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
SA11bsa054_u:9486: etattarhi kathaṃ nīyate yaduktam- anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma,
SA11bsa054_u:9490_1: aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā
SA11bsa054_u:9490_2: iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9494: ata eva ca tatraivoktam- upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9497: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA11bsa054_u:9502: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
SA11bsa054_u:9508: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
SA11bsa054_u:9509: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti /
SA11bsa054_u:9514: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:9516: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9517: tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:9518: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9521: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:9522: tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi neha pratanyate // āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:9538: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
SA11bsa054_u:9544: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi darśita eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9545: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
SA11bsa054_u:9551: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
SA11bsa054_u:9556: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9557: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9559: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti //
SA11bsa054_u:9562: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9564: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:9566: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9567: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9575: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9582: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
SA11bsa054_u:9583: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
SA11bsa054_u:9589: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
SA11bsa054_u:9595: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
SA11bsa054_u:9605_0: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9605_1: parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9607: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9614: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
SA11bsa054_u:9621: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9645: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9657: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9667: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11bsa054_u:9669: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
SA11bsa054_u:9684: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
SA11bsa054_u:9685: (Bcp 226) tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9686: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9688: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
SA11bsa054_u:9690: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9691_0: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:9691_2: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
SA11bsa054_u:9700_1: kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu
SA11bsa054_u:9712: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9716: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9719: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9735: tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9739: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9740: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9746: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa054_u:9749: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9755: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
SA11bsa054_u:9760: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9761: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9762: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9764: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9769: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:9772: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:9777: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9781: ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9784: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9789: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9796: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:9797: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:9799: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:9805: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9806: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9810: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9812: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9813: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti //
SA11bsa054_u:9817: mañjuśrīrāha- mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā //
SA11bsa054_u:9819: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9820: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9825: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9827: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9832: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9840: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?)
SA11bsa054_u:9842: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9843: tathāpi saṃvṛtyā na niṣidhyate iti / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9844: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9847: tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
SA11bsa054_u:9850: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9855: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:9856: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9857: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9860: tadā ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya?
SA11bsa054_u:9863: evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:9865: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9868: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā /
SA11bsa054_u:9874: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9875: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9876: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // Bca_9.77 //
SA11bsa054_u:9893: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA11bsa054_u:9906: kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:9911: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9912: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9914: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9915: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante /
SA11bsa054_u:9928: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:9936: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9937: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam /
SA11bsa054_u:9938: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:9939: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9945: na ca anyena kṛte 'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam,
SA11bsa054_u:9947: evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye 'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:9950: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11bsa054_u:9952: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:9957: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9958: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
SA11bsa054_u:9959: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9960: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ // Bca_9.79 //
SA11bsa054_u:9961: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9962: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ // Bca_9.80 //
SA11bsa054_u:9963: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:9980: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9992: atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu?
SA11bsa054_u:9993: naiva kaścideko 'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:9994: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9995: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9999: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī,
SA11bsa054_u:10009: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10010: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ // Bca_9.81 //
SA11bsa054_u:10011: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
SA11bsa054_u:10014: svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10020: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:10023: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:10024: tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10033: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10038: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:10040: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10043: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // Bca_9.83 //
SA11bsa054_u:10044: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:10050: sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate?
SA11bsa054_u:10051: kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
SA11bsa054_u:10060: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10061: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu,
SA11bsa054_u:10067: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
SA11bsa054_u:10075: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite 'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt puruṣabuddhirupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10081: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10083: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10086: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10088: evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate // Bca_9.85 //
SA11bsa054_u:10091: evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī,
SA11bsa054_u:10098: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10101: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10105: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:10118: tāvat kāyo 'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10121: karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo 'pi parikalpitasvabhāvā evetyupadarśayitumāha evamaṅgulītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10137: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10138: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
SA11bsa054_u:10143: iti / aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:10148: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10152: iti nyāyāt / tathāhi- pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:10160: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10161: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10162: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10163: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10171: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10173: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10180: evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10186: na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10187: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10193_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:10197: tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10200: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati,
SA11bsa054_u:10204: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10206: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:10209: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10210: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10211: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10212: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe 'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:10217: tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10218: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10219: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10228: iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10234: iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:10238: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10240: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10241: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ // Bca_9.88 //
SA11bsa054_u:10246: tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10247: kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10248: strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10249: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10250: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10253: na tat strī na puruṣa iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10254: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10265: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:10277: cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /
SA11bsa054_u:10282: iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /
SA11bsa054_u:10289: tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10293: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:10295: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10296: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10297: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate /
SA11bsa054_u:10313: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10316: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:10328: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10330: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10331: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:10336: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10338: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate /
SA11bsa054_u:10339: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate // Bca_9.89 //
SA11bsa054_u:10358: na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate /
SA11bsa054_u:10360: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti,
SA11bsa054_u:10364: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10366: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10368: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // Bca_9.90 //
SA11bsa054_u:10369: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā /
SA11bsa054_u:10375: kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha astītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10376: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa054_u:10381: prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:10384: na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10386: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10387: aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10390: nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā,
SA11bsa054_u:10394: iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:10396: kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt kadācinnopalabhyate ityatrāha viruddhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10399: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10405: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:10411: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10422: ahirmayūrasya sukhāya jāyate viṣaṃ viṣābhyāsavato rasāyanam /
SA11bsa054_u:10423: bhavanti cānandaviśeṣahetavo mukhaṃ tudantaḥ karabhasya kaṇṭakāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10425: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10427: ata eveti / yata eva abhiniveśasvabhāvā vedanā,
SA11bsa054_u:10428: ata eva vicāro 'yaṃ vimarśo 'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī,
SA11bsa054_u:10436: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10437: viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10444: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha sāntarāvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10449: sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ [abhi. ko.-3.30] iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10450: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:10454: tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10457: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10459: so 'pi na yujyate ityāha nirantaratve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10462: evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena vyavadhānaṃ syāt sadharmatā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10465: ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10470: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10482: tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
SA11bsa054_u:10483: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // Bca_9.95 //
SA11bsa054_u:10486: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10488: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10489: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:10490: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10491: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10500: tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10501: na caitad bhavato 'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10502: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // Bca_9.96 //
SA11bsa054_u:10517: iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha samūhasyāpītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10521: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10529: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10540: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10546: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10547: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10548: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase // Bca_9.99 //
SA11bsa054_u:10553: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
SA11bsa054_u:10558: kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10563: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā /
SA11bsa054_u:10569: cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya darśanam,
SA11bsa054_u:10571: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10577: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10581: anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10594: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā? āha-
SA11bsa054_u:10596: na ca naiva / anyena tatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānenānubhūyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10599: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10603: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10615: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10617: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11bsa054_u:10620: iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10621: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // Bca_9.102 //
SA11bsa054_u:10622: nirātmake kasyacidātmādervedakasyābhāvādasvāmike kalāpe ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt pratītyasamutpannamātre 'smin māyāsvabhāvavadupalambhagocaratāmupagate /
SA11bsa054_u:10623: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte- ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā /
SA11bsa054_u:10630: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
SA11bsa054_u:10632: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati- tathā kva punaridaṃ manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam?
SA11bsa054_u:10633: tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam /
SA11bsa054_u:10638: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10640: uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10643: tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna kāye ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10644: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
SA11bsa054_u:10645: tanna kiṃcidataḥ sattvāḥ prakṛtyā parinirvṛtāḥ // Bca_9.104 //
SA11bsa054_u:10653: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam,
SA11bsa054_u:10658: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10660: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo 'parimuktā ityucyante na tu paramārthataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10661: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10663: jñeyena saha cejjñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.105 //
SA11bsa054_u:10664: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10665: kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10666: iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati- tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10673: pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10674: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha- jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10679: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10683: paścāt tadanantaraṃ nivṛtte jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10690: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10696: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10706: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA11bsa054_u:10709: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:10715: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10720: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:10721: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10724: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10725: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10728_0: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā
SA11bsa054_u:10728_1: dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10731: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10737: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10751: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:10757: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10759: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha yadyevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10766: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10769: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10773: tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10786: yo 'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10787: so 'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10790: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10793: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10800: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10801: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10802: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10803: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ // Bca_9.108 //
SA11bsa054_u:10806: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10813: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi nāma parinirvṛto buddhyā viṣayīkṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10816: na raktacittenālambitaḥ svayaṃ prahīṇasarvakleśāvaraṇo vītarāgo 'pyavītarāgo bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10817: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito 'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10818: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10819: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10821: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10823: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10831: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11bsa054_u:10832: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā //
SA11bsa054_u:10836: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10837: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10839: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
SA11bsa054_u:10840: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10841: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10842: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10843: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
SA11bsa054_u:10844: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10853: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara //
SA11bsa054_u:10855: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve 'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
SA11bsa054_u:10857: tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10858: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro 'pi na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10868: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10869: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro 'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya pratanyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10876: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10881: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10884: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:10893: sarvavyavahāranivṛtteḥ sarvatra nirvyāpāratayā praśāntatvāt tadeva nirvāṇamabhidhīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10894: kalpitaviṣaye 'vaśyameva sarvatra vicāraḥ satyo na tu paramārthata ityāha yasya tvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10896: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādinaḥ etaddūyaṃ vicāro vicāryaṃ ceti etadubhayamapi satyaṃ paramārthasat,
SA11bsa054_u:10897: sa eva bhāvasvabhāvavādī atyantaduḥsthitaḥ atyantamatiśayena duḥkhena sthito duḥsthitaḥ duṣkaraṇīyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10899: yadi jñānavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ // Bca_9.112 //
SA11bsa054_u:10900: yadi jñānavaśāt jñānasya pramāṇasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt arthaḥ prameyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10904: jñānasya pramāṇasya punarastitvaṃ kuto niścitamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10905: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā?
SA11bsa054_u:10910: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10912: atha jñeyasya prameyasya vaśāt jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10915: tadā svayameva jñeyaṃ jñānāstitve vyavasthānibandhanaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10916: tacca kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhamiti pṛcchati- jñeyāstitve punaḥ kā gatiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:10917: prameyasiddhaye jñānāntarānusaraṇe tadapi jñānāntaraṃ kutaḥ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10921: syādetat- bhavedetat yadi jñānasya jñeyasya vā siddhaye jñānāntarāpekṣā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10925: atha punarevamabhidhīyate- anyonyasya jñānasya jñeyasya parasparasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt jñānajñeyayorapi sattvamastitvaṃ niścīyate jñānavaśājjñeyasya jñeyavaśācca jñānasyeti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:10931: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10934: pitā janakaḥ yadi putraṃ vinā putramantareṇa na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10937: kutaḥ kasmāt piturabhāvāt putrasya janyasya saṃbhavaḥ janma astu?
SA11bsa054_u:10940: yataḥ putrasya abhāve asattve pitā nāsti na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10946: ataḥ itaretarāśrayaṇādekābhāvādanyatarābhāvaḥ syāditi dvayorapyanayorabhāva iti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10952: jñānaparicchedyatayā ca jñeyamiti yāvat jñānaṃ na sidhyati,
SA11bsa054_u:10954: tāvat paricchedyatayā ca jñeyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10956: syādetat- na brūmaḥ- anyonyavaśāt siddhiranayoḥ api tu jñeyakāryaṃ jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10960: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate // Bca_9.115 //
SA11bsa054_u:10962: bījaṃ tenaiva bījājjātena aṅkureṇa sūcyate gamyate yathā,
SA11bsa054_u:10963: tathā atra jñeyāt prameyāt jñānena jātena utpannena tatsattā tasya jñeyasya sattā sadbhāvaḥ kiṃ na gamyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10968: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate // Bca_9.116 //
SA11bsa054_u:10971: kiṃ tarhi anyato jñānādaṅkuravyatiriktāt tadastīti gamyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10972: tathā hi- na yogyatāmātreṇa kāryaṃ kāraṇasya gamakam,
SA11bsa054_u:10976: ataḥ prākpratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasya punaḥ paścāt kkacid bījāvinābhāvinamaṅkuramupalabdhavataḥ aṅkurādadhyavasāyātmakamanumānamutpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10979: jñānāstitvaṃ jñānasya sadbhāvaḥ kuto jñātaṃ kasmāt pratītam?
SA11bsa054_u:10982: yad yasmāt jñeyaṃ tena jñānena jñeyakāryeṇa gamyate avasīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10987: kālpanikapakṣe tu yathāprasiddhavyavahāramāśritya śakyate iti niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:10988: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10989: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
SA11bsa054_u:10991: ityasyārthasya samarthanārthaṃ nāpyahetuta iti turīyakoṭiprasādhanāya tāvat svabhāvavādimatamapākartumāha loka ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10993: tathā hi te svaparasvabhāvasarvahetunirapekṣameva bhāvagrāmavaicitryamutpadyate iti varṇayanti /
SA11bsa054_u:10995: na ca cetano 'pi kaścidanyaḥ karmaṇā tādṛśanirmāṇapravīṇa upalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10998: tasmāt kiṃcitkāraṇamantareṇaiva sarvamidaṃ jagadvaicitryamutpadyate iti teṣāṃ matam, taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:11019: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11022: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā /
SA11bsa054_u:11029: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11030: kiṃ tu tasyaiva kutaḥ sa bhavatīti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11035: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet,
SA11bsa054_u:11037: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11038: tasyāpi tatpūrvasya hetoḥ kuto viśeṣa iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:11040: iti uttarottarasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvapūrvasya viśeṣādityuttaraṃ vācyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11041: na caivamanavasthānamaniṣṭaṃ kiṃcidāpādayati- anavarāgrasya saṃsārasya pūrvakoṭirna prajñāyate ityabhyupagamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11042: ata eva phalāviparyayo 'pi na svato bhavatītyāha kasmāccedityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11045_0: pūrvahetuprabhāvataḥ pūrvasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt svahetunā sa tādṛśastatsvabhāvo
SA11bsa054_u:11052_0: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me
SA11bsa054_u:11052_1: māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti
SA11bsa054_u:11053: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñāṃ svayameva śātayet /
SA11bsa054_u:11054: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet //
SA11bsa054_u:11057: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11059: īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ- sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11062: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam /
SA11bsa054_u:11063_0: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:11064: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate?
SA11bsa054_u:11065: iti naiyāyikādiveśmakathāmabhidhāya pratyācaṣṭe- īśvaro jagato hetuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11067: sa eva jagato viśvasya hetuḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:11069: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11081: naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati /
SA11bsa054_u:11084: tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11087: tat karma kāruṇikaḥ kimiti kārayati yenāniṣṭaṃ phalamupabhujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:11090: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā?
SA11bsa054_u:11100: atha kṛtasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśādavaśyaṃ tena tatphalamanubhavitavyamiti tadupabhogāya vyāpriyate iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:11105: evaṃ hi tadicchāyattavṛttitayā tasyāparipākāt tena svamaiśvaryamupadarśitaṃ tatra bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:11107: mahad bata anena svamaiśvaryamitthaṃ dyotitamanyatra syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11108: tat parakarmaṇāpi samākṛṣṭo nāma nātmani vaśitvamadhigacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:11109: īśvarataḥ karmaṇa eva mahat sāmarthyamevaṃ prakāśitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11110: tadvaraṃ karmaiva paryupāsyaṃ yatsāmarthyena samākṛṣyamāṇo maheśvaro 'pi sthātumasamarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11112: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:11117: tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati,
SA11bsa054_u:11125: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11127: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate //
SA11bsa054_u:11138: na hi svasthātmā niraparādhaṃ janaṃ pīḍayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11141: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete /
SA11bsa054_u:11145: tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11147: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11156: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti /
SA11bsa054_u:11159: sukhasya duḥkhasya na ko 'pi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
SA11bsa054_u:11162: tasmādakartṛkameva idaṃ jagadaśeṣamiti na paridṛṣṭakāraṇādanyaḥ svatantraścetano vā tasya kartā kaścidasti /
SA11bsa054_u:11165: īśvarakāraṇavādinaṃ pṛcchati- vada brūhi ko 'yamīśvaro bhavato 'bhimataḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11168: na ca anupalabdhānvayavyatirekavyāpārasya kāraṇatā prakalpayituṃ yuktā,
SA11bsa054_u:11171: na cānyasya kṣitibījādivyatiriktasya anvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat dṛśyate kāryam /
SA11bsa054_u:11172: tat kathaṃ tasya kāryopayogitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate? yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:11176: atha pṛthivyādīni bhūtānyeva īśvaro bhavatviti parābhiprāyamāśaṅkayāha bhūtāni cedityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11177: bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ // Bca_9.119 //
SA11bsa054_u:11187: nāmamātre eva kimiha mahāsamārambheṇa tatprasādhanāya śramaḥ āyāsaḥ kriyate?
SA11bsa054_u:11189: tvayā punastānyeva bhūtāni īśvaraḥ iti nārthataḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11193: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11194: laṅghayāścāśucayaścaiva kṣmādayo na sa īśvaraḥ // Bca_9.120 //
SA11bsa054_u:11208: (Bcp 257) kṣmādayaḥ kṣmā pṛthivī ādiryeṣāmaptejovāyūnāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11221: pūrvameva vistareṇa ātmanaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt niḥsvabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadasau /
SA11bsa054_u:11222: athāpi syāt- avitarkyamāhātmyatvādasya nārvāgdarśanairidamitthamiti tatsvarūpaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyamityāha acintyasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11225: tadā acintyasya ca cintāpathamatikrāntasya īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ yugapatkāraṇatvamapi acintyamatarkyaṃ kimucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:11234: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca,
SA11bsa054_u:11241: nanu bhoḥ, asāvātmā dhruvo nityo 'bhimato bhavatām /
SA11bsa054_u:11243: anyathā nitya eva sa na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11245: anyatrāpi na tasya sṛṣṭivyāpāra upalakśyate ityāha kṣmādītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11246: kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca // Bca_9.122 //
