SA11bsa054_u:11255: īśvaro 'pi dhruvaḥ iti ātmānamasau na karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:11261: karmaṇaḥ śubhāśubhāt yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca bhavataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭavipākaje,
SA11bsa054_u:11262: tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ / evaṃ sati-
SA11bsa054_u:11268: hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet // Bca_9.123 //
SA11bsa054_u:11269: tathāhi asau nityo vā jagato hetuḥ syādanityo vā?
SA11bsa054_u:11271: tatra nityatve sati hetoḥ kāraṇasya ādirnāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:11275: nityamupasthite samarthasvabhāve hetau kāryamapi tajjanyamajastrameva jāyeta /
SA11bsa054_u:11276: iti tatsāmarthyapratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prāpnoti / tat-
SA11bsa054_u:11278: kasmāt kāraṇāt sadā sarvakālaṃ na kurute?
SA11bsa054_u:11279: na sarvaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti kathaṃ kasyacit kāryasya kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11280: athavā / anyathāvatāryate- yadi ca neśvaro jagataḥ kartā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:11283: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na cedasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11284: phalasya sattvabhājanalokavivartādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:11286: anādau saṃsāre hi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena sthitisaṃvartavivartānāṃ pravartanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11290: pralayakāle 'pi tasyānupahatatayā māhātmyasyābhyupagamāt phalasya tatkṛtasya sargādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ kuto bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:11291: nityatayā tatkāraṇasya sadā samarthatvāt sargādikamapi nityameva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11292: ato nityasamarthe tasmin sargāderādireva na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11293: tataḥ kathaṃ sargasyādāvapi tadvayāpāro bhavet? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11305: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11313: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma /
SA11bsa054_u:11321: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā?
SA11bsa054_u:11334: tena kāraṇena tadāyattavṛttīnāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ sadāsaṃnihitatvādasau nityaḥ kartā kimapekṣatām?
SA11bsa054_u:11336: itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta //
SA11bsa054_u:11340: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11342: yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11344: na hi sāmagrīmantareṇa satyapi samarthe kartari kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11345: yathā kila paṭotpādanasamarthe 'pi kvaciddhetau turītantuvemādikamantareṇa na paṭa utpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:11356: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11361: anyathāpi teṣāmapi pūrvaṃ tatsāmarthyasadbhāve tatkriyāprasaṅgo na nivartate iti sādhyavikalo (Bcp 260) dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11364: sa ca sarvadā saṃnihitasvabhāva iti kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīvaikalyamapyasya?
SA11bsa054_u:11376: na ca avidyamānasvabhāve vandhyāsuta iva kiṃcit kartuṃ śakyate nīrūpatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11401: evaṃ kurvataḥ kāryamabhinirvartayataḥ sataḥ tasya kuta īśatā,
SA11bsa054_u:11403: etena yaduktaṃ kenacit- buddhimattvādīśvarasya naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11408: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11411: kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge 'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye 'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11413: tathā tadbhāve 'pi sarvakāryaṃ kiṃ na karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:11422: samartho 'pyeṣa prakṛtyā sahakāriṇāmasaṃnidhau nava kāraka iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:11423: mātāpi satī prakṛtyā bandhyā ityetadapi tarhi devānāṃ priyeṇa vaktavyamityāstāṃ tāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:11425: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham //
SA11bsa054_u:11427: tarhi nityaparamāṇupuñjamayaṃ dvayaṇukādikrameṇotthaṃ kṣititaruparvatādikaṃ bhavatvityāha ye 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11429: ye 'pi mīmāṃsakādivādino nityānaṇūn paramāṇunāhuḥ jagadvaicitryakāraṇatvena bruvate,
SA11bsa054_u:11430: te 'pi vādinaḥ pūrvam “aṃśā apyaṇubhedena” [9.87]ityādinā paramāṇuvicārasamaye tatpratiṣedhānnivāritā nirākṛtāḥ ato nityaparamāṇumayamapi nedaṃ jagat //
SA11bsa054_u:11431_0: evamīśvarakāraṇatāṃ ślokārdhena antarāle eva nityaparamāṇusvabhāvatāṃ ca jagato nirasya
SA11bsa054_u:11431_1: tasyaiva turyaprakārasya samarthanāya pradhānapariṇāmarūpatāṃ nirākartuṃ sāṃkhyamatamudbhāvayannāha sāṃkhyā ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11432: sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam // Bca_9.127 //
SA11bsa054_u:11433: sāṃkhyāḥ kāpilāḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtirityaparanāmadheyam icchanti manyante nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:11434: tacca nityamavinaśvarasvabhāvaṃ lokasya sarvasya carācarasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmarūpeṇa hetumicchanti //
SA11bsa054_u:11438: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante,
SA11bsa054_u:11457: ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi /
SA11bsa054_u:11460: śrotraṃ tvakū cakṣū rasanaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:11464: pañcabhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhavanti pañca bhūtāni ca ākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivyākhyāni /
SA11bsa054_u:11466: mahadahaṃkārau śabdādayaśca pañca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11467: ekādaśendriyāṇi ākāśādayaśca pañca kāryameva na kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:11470: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11480: evaṃ kila pradhānāt kāryarūpeṇa jagadvivartaḥ pravartate iti kāpilāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11481: tadevaṃ tat sarvamākāśe viracitacitramiva pratibhāsate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī dūṣayitumāha ekasyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:11483: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam /
SA11bsa054_u:11490: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā // Bca_9.129 //
SA11bsa054_u:11491: evameva pradhānavat guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpā na vidyante /
SA11bsa054_u:11495: tathā hi sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ bruvatāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇā api svarūpeṇa triguṇātmakāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA11bsa054_u:11496: tathā tadguṇā api triguṇātmakatayā naikasvabhāvā vidyante //
SA11bsa054_u:11497: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi,
SA11bsa054_u:11498: tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo 'pi na yujyante ityāha guṇābhāve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11512: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11517: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11519: te ca guṇā na hi santi /
SA11bsa054_u:11521: athāpi syāt- na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante,
SA11bsa054_u:11524: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam,
SA11bsa054_u:11530: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11531: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11547: paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:11558: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11563: ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati /
SA11bsa054_u:11565: sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:11567: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam?
SA11bsa054_u:11571: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham // Bca_9.133 //
SA11bsa054_u:11576: kutaḥ? yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat,
SA11bsa054_u:11579: nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā ekasya na yukteti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11580: athāpi syāt- ekadā parasparaviruddhayorekasminnayogaḥ pūrvadharmanivṛttau tu dharmāntarotpatterna doṣa ityāha sthaulyamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11582: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11583: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:11591: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11598: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11600: tadā tasmin nivṛtte 'pi pūrvavat sukhasaṃvedanaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11603: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:11612: yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:11615: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:11633: anabhilāṣiṇo 'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā /
SA11bsa054_u:11634: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11638: api ca / satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11640: annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet / katham?
SA11bsa054_u:11646: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11649: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:11650: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11651: tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ paśyatītyāśaṅkayannāha mohādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11654: mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11658: yadi nāma na loko 'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:11661: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino 'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11663: te 'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11669: tathāhi- kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11682: evaṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ kāpilaḥ siddhāntavādino 'pi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇamāsañjayannāha pramāṇamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11684: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11686: pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti /
SA11bsa054_u:11690: tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt pramāṇānniścitā,
SA11bsa054_u:11693: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11697: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11698: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11699: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate,
SA11bsa054_u:11700: tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:11702: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā // Bca_9.140 //
SA11bsa054_u:11706: tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11708: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate //
SA11bsa054_u:11709: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11710: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
SA11bsa054_u:11712: tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ / kiṃ karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:11714: tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti /
SA11bsa054_u:11715: niṣedhayati- tathaiva tarhi seti cenna mṛṣā ca sā // Bca_9.141 //
SA11bsa054_u:11716: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā /
SA11bsa054_u:11718: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11720: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā svapnopalabdhasya vastuno 'nutpannāniruddhasyāpi kalpanopadarśitau bhāvābhāvau na paramārthasantau,
SA11bsa054_u:11722: na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:11725: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye 'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate /
SA11bsa054_u:11732: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11737: svabhāvāderahetuto 'kāraṇājjātaṃ kiṃcit kāryaṃ nāsti na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11742: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11744: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11745: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam // Bca_9.142 //
SA11bsa054_u:11746: na ca naiva / vyastasamasteṣviti vyasteṣu samastesu ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11752: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:11753: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām?
SA11bsa054_u:11754: utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11755: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11758: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran /
SA11bsa054_u:11759: na ca etadabhyupagacchato 'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti,
SA11bsa054_u:11765: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:11771: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11776: tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:11777: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11784: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti,
SA11bsa054_u:11792: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11793: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:11795: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti /
SA11bsa054_u:11796: tasmāt paramārthato 'nutpannāniruddhasvabhāvaṃ māyāmarīcipratibimbapratiśrutkāsamaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvaśūnyameva sarvaṃ viśvamābhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:11800_0: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:11802: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:11807: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11826: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11827: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:11830: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11835: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11847: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:11848: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:11849: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11850: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:11851: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11856: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
SA11bsa054_u:11859: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11881: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ // iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11889: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11890: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:11900: sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
SA11bsa054_u:11901: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11902: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:11905: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11908: tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11911: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:11914: pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11926: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11949: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:11950: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam // Bca_9.143 //
SA11bsa054_u:11951: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya //
SA11bsa054_u:11955: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām // Bca_9.144 //
SA11bsa054_u:11959: yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:11968: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:11973: pratibimbasame tasmin kṛtrime satyatā katham // Bca_9.145 //
SA11bsa054_u:11981: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11984: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA11bsa054_u:11985: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11988: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:11992: tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11994: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam?
SA11bsa054_u:12003: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
SA11bsa054_u:12004: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12021: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
SA11bsa054_u:12026: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:12035: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
SA11bsa054_u:12040: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate //
SA11bsa054_u:12041: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:12043: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12049: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:12060: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:12061: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:12065: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:12066: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:12068: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:12069: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12076: tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:12078: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam /
SA11bsa054_u:12079: tadā ca bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ko 'bhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti na vidmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12082: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato 'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12083: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:12092: “utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā” /
SA11bsa054_u:12099: idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:12104: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
SA11bsa054_u:12112: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:12114: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:12115: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ // iti //
SA11bsa054_u:12118: iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha svapnetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12120: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12128: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:12135: nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ na viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.151 //
SA11bsa054_u:12140: kutaḥ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:12144: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā //
SA11bsa054_u:12146: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12147: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:12148: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati // Bca_9.152 //
SA11bsa054_u:12149: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
SA11bsa054_u:12150: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ // Bca_9.153 //
SA11bsa054_u:12151: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:12152: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt // Bca_9.154 //
SA11bsa054_u:12153: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham,
SA11bsa054_u:12155: kiṃ hṛtam, kimapahṛtaṃ kena kasyacit bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:12158: paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:12164: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā?
SA11bsa054_u:12169: kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:12176: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:12179: jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:12195: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:12204: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:12210: yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:12211: tatra jinena janasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
SA11bsa054_u:12214: saṃvṛti prajñapayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaṅgatayo bhaṇi sattvagaṇānām /
SA11bsa054_u:12215: narakagatīśca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃśca marūṃśca //
SA11bsa054_u:12244: vyathā yeṣvapāyeṣu te tathoktāḥ, teṣu ca /
SA11bsa054_u:12247: āgatyāgatya sugatiṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā sukhocitāḥ // Bca_9.157 //
SA11bsa054_u:12254: bhave saṃsāre kāmarūpārūpyasvabhāve bahuprapātaśca bahutara upaghātaśca /
SA11bsa054_u:12256: tatra ca bhave prapāte vā atattvamīdṛśaṃ vyāmohavijṛmbhitametādṛśaṃ sarvajanasādhāraṇaṃ yathāvidhaṃ pratipāditaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:12266: anantā anavadhikālavipākatayā aparyantā vā duḥkhānāmativipulatayā mahāyānamanadhigamya nistarītumaśakyatvāt, sāgarāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12267: tathāpi kathaṃcit mahatā vīryeṇa kuśalapakṣopacayāt bhūyasā kālena sugatiṃ prāpya kṣapayituṃ śakyante ityata āha tatraivamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12272: tatra tathārūpe samāveśe evaṃ paridṛśyamānarūpā alpabalatā /
SA11bsa054_u:12279: ārogyasya ārogyāya vārogopaśamāya vyāpāraiḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṭutiktabhaiṣajyakaṣāyapānādibhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12280: kuśalopārjanamantareṇa vṛthā caiva āyurvahatyāśu iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12294: vṛthaiva niṣphalameva kuśalapakṣopacayarahitatvāt āyurvahati yāti āśu śīghram,
SA11bsa054_u:12306: tatrāpi evamavasthāṃ gate 'pi abhyastavikṣepaḥ pariśīlitamauddhatyaṃ tasya nivāraṇaṃ nivartanaṃ tasya gatiranupraveśaḥ kutaḥ? naivāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:12307: tatrāpi evamanarthaparaṃparāyāṃ sthitānāṃ kathaṃcit kuśalapakṣaṃ samīkṣya māro yatate mahāpāyaprapātane,
SA11bsa054_u:12311: evamapi kadācit satyaratnādiṣu abhisaṃpratyayavaśāt kathaṃcit kalyāṇamupajāyate ityāha tatrāsanmārgetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12315: tatra evaṃ daśāṃ prāpnoti- samyagdṛṣṭivipakṣasya asanmārgasya cārvākamīmāṃsakādiparidīpitasya bāhulyāt bhūyastvāt vicikitsā sanmārge vimatiśca durjayā,
SA11bsa054_u:12324: kathaṃcit buddhotpādasaṃbhave 'pi kleśaughaḥ [jātijarāmaraṇā] dīnāmoghaḥ avicchinnaḥ pravāhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12332: sāṃpratamevaṃ sattvān suduḥkhitān samīkṣya karuṇāmreḍitahṛdayaḥ paraduḥkhaduḥkhī śāstrakāraḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śocayannāha aho bateti-
SA11bsa054_u:12337: ke punaramī sattvāḥ śocanīyā ityāha ye ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12339: ye sattvā avidyāndhīkṛtajñānalocanāḥ nekṣante na paśyanti svadauḥsthityaṃ svasya ātmano duḥkhāvasthitatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:12345: snātvā snātvā jalāvagāhanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā yathā kaścidupahatabuddhiḥ śītārtaḥ sukhābhilāṣī /
SA11bsa054_u:12353: aho bata atibahulatarājñānāndhakārākramaṇamamīṣāṃ yadātmagatamapi pramādaṃ na paśyantītyāha ajaretyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12356: na vidyate jarā jīrṇatā yeṣāṃ te ajarāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12358: teṣāmajarāṇāmamarāṇāmiva līlā viceṣṭitaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12359: teṣāmevamanayā līlayā viharatāṃ niścitaṃ vicaratāṃ satām /
SA11bsa054_u:12367: tadyathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaścatvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyuḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:12375: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
SA11bsa054_u:12378: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
SA11bsa054_u:12387: tadyathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇamanupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:12388: sa ca mṛgarājo 'tibalaṃ vyālamukhamāsādya vivaśo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:12389_0: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyena apagatamadasya atrāṇasya apratiśaraṇasya
SA11bsa054_u:12389_1: aparāyaṇasya marmasu cchidyamāneṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe parituṣitavihvalavadanasya
SA11bsa054_u:12389_5: imaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokamākramataḥ mahāpathaṃ vrajataḥ mahākāntāraṃ praviśataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:12389_7: karmavāyunā nīyamānasya nimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ vrajato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat śaraṇaṃ nānyat
SA11bsa054_u:12390: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:12407: duḥkhānyeva agnayaḥ tai saṃtāpitānāṃ sattvānāṃ śāntiṃ jātyādiduḥkhānalatāpapraśamanam /
SA11bsa054_u:12419: evamabhyudayasaṃpadi pareṣāṃ ceto vidhāya niḥśreyasasaṃpadi pradarśayannāha kadetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:12422: kadā kasmin kāle upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo bhāvagrāhābhiniviṣṭebhyo deśayiṣyāmi prakāśayiṣyāmi /
SA11bsa054_u:12428: puṇyasya jñānādeḥ saṃbhāraṃ kadā upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo deśayiṣyāmīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12439: te santo guṇadoṣayorapi ca taiḥ sāraṃ vimiśrādato
SA11bsa054_u:12440: grāhyaṃ sarvamakalmaṣaṃ viṣamiva tyājyaṃ duruktaṃ yadi //
SA11bsa054_u:12441: na yuktamuktaṃ kimapīha yanmayā paraṃ prajātaṃ skhalitaṃ tadeva me /
SA11bsa054_u:12442: nanu grahīṣyanti mamātra sādhavo matiṃ mayānena kṛtena sāṃpratam //
SA11bsa054_u:12445: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vrajati manaso gocaratvaṃ kathaṃcit
SA11bsa054_u:12446: tādṛśyarthe skhalati na matiḥ kasya vai mādṛśasya /
SA11bsa054_u:12451: yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ hitaphalaṃ tenāśu sarvo jano
SA11bsa054_u:12460: āśu prāptikarī jinasya padavīṃ sādya likhitvā mayā
SA11bsa054_u:12461: prāptaṃ yatkuśalaṃ susaṃpadi padaṃ tenāstu buddho janaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:12482: tena sarve janāḥ santu bodhicaryāvibhūṣaṇāḥ // Bca_10.1 //
SA11bsa054_u:12495: so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:12498: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puāpayuddham // Bca_10.9 //
SA11bsa054_u:12504: dhvāntaṃ dhvastaṃ samantātsukharatijananī kasya saumyā prabheyam /
SA11bsa054_u:12507: dṛṣṭvā prāmodyavegādvayapagataduritā yāntu tenaiva sārdham // Bca_10.11 //
SA11bsa054_u:12512: āyātāyāta śīghraṃ bhayamapanayata bhrātaro jīvitāḥ smaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:12515: jātaṃ saṃbodhicittaṃ sakalajanaparitrāṇamātā dayā ca // Bca_10.13 //
SA11bsa054_u:12519: dṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām // Bca_10.14 //
SA11bsa054_u:12525: bhavantu sukhinaḥ pretā yathottarakurau narāḥ // Bca_10.17 //
SA11bsa054_u:12526: saṃtarpyantāṃ pretāḥ strāpyantāṃ śītalā bhavantu sadā /
SA11bsa054_u:12528: andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /
SA11bsa054_u:12533: udvigrāśca nirudvegā dhṛtimanto bhavantu ca // Bca_10.21 //
SA11bsa054_u:12535: durbalā balinaḥ santu strigdhacittāḥ parasparam // Bca_10.22 //
SA11bsa054_u:12537: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
SA11bsa054_u:12538: yena kāryeṇa gacchanti tadupāyena sidhyatu // Bca_10.23 //
SA11bsa054_u:12540: kṣemeṇa kūlamāsādya ramantāṃ saha bandhubhiḥ // Bca_10.24 //
SA11bsa054_u:12551: yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12552: prāpnuvantūccatāṃ nīcā hatamānā bhavantu ca // Bca_10.30 //
SA11bsa054_u:12554: viramya sarvapāpebhyaḥ kurvantu kuśalaṃ sadā // Bca_10.31 //
SA11bsa054_u:12558: nityaṃ jīvantu sukhitā mṛtyuśabdo 'pi naśyatu // Bca_10.33 //
SA11bsa054_u:12562: mṛdvī ca vaiḍūryamayī bhūmiḥ sarvatra tiṣṭhatu // Bca_10.35 //
SA11bsa054_u:12571: sphīto bhavatu lokaśca rājā bhavatu dhārmikaḥ // Bca_10.39 //
SA11bsa054_u:12572: śaktā bhavantu cauṣadhyo mantrāḥ sidhyantu jāpinām /
SA11bsa054_u:12574: mā kaścidduḥkhitaḥ sattvo mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:12575: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūtkaścicca durmanāḥ // Bca_10.41 //
SA11bsa054_u:12577: nityaṃ syātsaṃghasāmagrī saṃghakāryaṃ ca sidhyatu // Bca_10.42 //
SA11bsa054_u:12598: yadā ca draṣṭukāmaḥ syāṃ praṣṭukāmaśca kiṃcana /
SA11bsa054_u:12601: yathā carati mañjuśrīḥ saiva caryā bhavenmama // Bca_10.54 //
